Following the Settings recommendations from a couple of the more technical reviews here helped to optimize the picture for me. Finally, the price was amazing.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: James Armstrong
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this TV. My fiancee and I have been wanting to get a newer TV for our bedroom for a while so we got on Amazon and searched thru all the TV's in the size we wanted and read all the reviews and we both decided on this one. It's not to big and not to small. It is just right for us.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32-Inch
Reviews.Author: Elaine A. Schulte "Reader and Writer"
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews before I bought this TV, and noticed that one of the complaints against it was that it didn't have good sound. I should have paid attention to that, but since I have no intention to use it for anything other than simply watching TV, I felt it would not be a problem for me. Boy, was I mistaken! Male voices are often unclear and accompanied with static. Otherwise, I enjoy the TV. The picture is good and the profile is attractive. Now if they could just improve the quality of the sound.

Reviews.Title: Fits my needs. Perfect for a bedroom.
Reviews.Author: Sarajones108
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a television just for movies and any entertainment programs, you can go for this one without any hesitation. I f you need something for watching football games, or play video games go for a bigger one with higher frequency.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32 inch HDTV
Reviews.Author: Thomas Pilon
Reviews.Content: I have had this tv for a little over a month now and I'm quite pleased with it. Setup was easy to accomplish, the picture and sound quality is excellent. I'm not a big fan of television so screen size and home theater features were not a consideration in my selection, the high definition video is a nice feature, tho. I'm looking forward to college basketball and tennis in hi-def.

Reviews.Title: Overall very good picture.  Light weight.  Limited connection ports & no streaming or smart connection
Reviews.Author: J. Powell

This is my first LED and I'm happy with the lower power consumption ($7 per year) and would be simple to mount this. Go bigger if you can fit it. This could easily double as a nice computer monitor.

Reviews.Title: WOW
Reviews.Author: Joy Jordan
Reviews.Content: This TV is exceptional!  Brilliant color, wide range viewing, easy installation to name a few.  Amazon offered a great price and this set stands up to higher priced models.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV!
Reviews.Author: SteelCity1981
Reviews.Content: Everything from top to bottom works great right out of the box. The picture and sound quality is amazing. It has the best picture and sound quality i have ever seen on a TV this size for this price. I did a lot of research and went to many retail stores and i couldn't find a TV in this size that had not only a great picture but great sound at this price. I think what amazes me the most about this TV is there is no backlight bleed whatsoever. Unlike a lot of TV's especially in this price range where you see backlight bleeding, this TV has none! I kid you not.It doesn't have internet tv capability, but I use my Xbox 360 anyhow for that stuff. So that doesn't bother me in the least bit. You can always buy an internet TV box for it though if you don't have a  gaming console or any other media device.It doesn't have 3D capability built in, but since the TV meets the requirements of viewing 3D content anyhow, I can always buy a 3D converter box for it.If i can find one con with this tv it's the fact that you only get 2 HDMI ports instead of 3 like with many TV's in this price range, but honestly if that's the only con I can find with this TV then I can def live with it. I mean If i need more HDMI ports I can always buy an HDMI spilter. So it's not a big deal.If you are looking for a basic HDTV with amazing picture quality and sound at a good price, then this is the TV for you.

Reviews.Title: Great TV but....
Reviews.Author: eagle251
Reviews.Content: This TV is great now I have been able to watch it.  It arrived on time with great Amazon service.  However, although there was a stand in the box, the part to connect the stand to the tv was missing.  Samsung was great on customer service but I was unable to use the TV for 2 weeks after receiving it.  I had bought this for a mother's day gift and missed that date by a week due to the missing part.  Samsung sent the part, screws and another stand but it took 2 weeks to get it.Now it's up and running great.  Real good HD picture and pretty good non-digital picture.  This is the 5th Samsung TV I have bought.  Three 26 inchers, this 46 incher, and a 55 incher...All are great and I would buy them again.

Reviews.Title: Bad uniformity
Reviews.Author: Kattmandu
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV from a local retailer (not Amazon) to use as a computer monitor.  Renaming the input to PC quickly increased the resolution.  However, the uniformity of the display is horrible.  The display has dark corners and a dark center while bright everywhere else.  Samsung customer service is horrible as well.  Every time I create a ticket to have the device serviced, they close the ticket and tell me to change my display settings.  Samsung is quickly dropping on my list of quality products.

Reviews.Title: Not A Fan Anymore
Reviews.Author: James Irwin
Reviews.Content: I used to be a Samsung fan but am looking to switch eventually. I must have got a lemon being after only a couple months my TV died and needed to be taken in to a warranty repair shop. I do like the picture however but have heard great things about other brands also so I will try one of those when I get board with this 46"

Reviews.Title: A pain to set up, but decent after that
Reviews.Author: The Duke "Maximus"
Reviews.Content: When I first got this the picture was terrible.  It took a lot of tweaking to get it to look right.  A friend of mine had a DVD with a feature to calibrate LCD TVs, so that helped quite a bit.  I've never had a TV that required so much adjustment right out of the box.

Reviews.Title: Another Great Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: RAF
Reviews.Content: This is now my fifth Samsung LED tv and it continues to deliver a great picture.  The 1080p 60Hz picture presents a clear, bright high resolution picture without blur or pixelation.  With my Comcast HD box, the picture is superb.  I also get a great picture from Netflix or Amazon Instant on my Roku 3 box.  All in all, just another excellent Samsung TV.  Next step, move toward a UHD tv in a few years.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed in picture, but it sounded good, sent back
Reviews.Author: T. Orlando
Reviews.Content: I got this to replace a 32 inch lcd that suddenly broke after only 3 years.  Since I heard Samsung is good, I got this, and increased size to 40 since many places say that is a good size for 9 feet.  I think they were talking about tv's with a perfect picture, because at 9 feet this one was awful.  I am comparing to a previous tv, that I was very happy with.  I also have a 50 plasma to compare to.  The plasma is truly a beautiful picture, in all cases/channels.  I was watching all the NYC local news on hd Fios, all the big name stations have live news with beautiful studios.  Each station was different, and all not pleasing.  I spent a lot of time adjusting the picture, they offer lots of ways to change it, but it would only look good for 1 or 2, not all stations.  (my other looked great for ALL).  The faces of people were washed out and lost the natural look, and colors varied.  Again I am comparing to 2 other hd tv's that people look great on all the channels.  As a footnote, I sent it back, replaced with a 32 inch LG 32LN5300 that was on sale, in a store so I can SEE IT first.  The picture is great on that, without playing with settings, so it's not me.  (I was also impressed with the 42 LG, but that seemed a little big for my room).  At least the sound was better than expected (and better then the smaller LG).

Reviews.Title: Great Picture! Typical Samsung
Reviews.Author: boomer65
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv for the bedroom. I own two other Samsung tv's and the picture is great.Received tv via UPS, from time received until up and running about 15 minutes.It does not have Wi-Fi built in, nor is  it a smart tv. I connected with an Amazon Fire TV, and now itconnected to the internet and has access to the many apps provided by Amazon.I really can't say anything negative about the tv. Positives are the quality of the picture and the price.Be sure and have hdmi cables available to connect an Amazon Fire tv, Roku device, or HD cable box.Mfg. date March 2014Mfg. in MexicoVer. UU02

Reviews.Title: Superb TV for the price: Samsung UN EH5000
Reviews.Author: starky
Reviews.Content: Well I always have been a LG fan - a 55 LW5600 doing the works in the living room (got a fantastic 1 K deal from Frys in California), but this Samsung UN EH5000 was a value star of sorts. Picked this up to do the duty in the bed room and had very little expectations from it. For a couple of hours of movie viewing at weekend or checking the news at night, wanted to spend as less as possible. Well Amazon to the rescue. After carefully lining up all the LG possible starters and a Toshiba TV found this gen for about $342 - that's correct for a 40 incher.Out of the box the TV had colors that need a lot of toning down. My LG had isf calibration and a THX mode I had unlocked which gave brilliant output but the only complain was a clouding with a black picture (that has detoriated a bit over the last 2 years - thanks to the IPS panels that LG used). The Samsung has no complaints till date - a S-PVA panel and after checking foe the UD04 version and system menu "40A6AF1D", which meant the higher end panel from Samsung.The right settings and pairing it with the Yamaha (YS101BL) the setup was amazing and just right for a bedroom.The sound from the TV is also decently acceptable but a soundbar does wonders.Biggest compliant was with Amazon shipping and packaging by both Amazon and Samsung. 4 blocks of styrofoam holds the TV in place in a thin cardboard package which was crushed and after taking delivery realizing it being sogging wet. Mid-west's amazing run of bad weather delayed prime shipment by a day and UPS ensured that even with a thin layer of plastic around the TV (courtesy Amazon I believe), the outer box was damaged. Had a word with Amazon CC (who are usually amazingly great) and cited my case. Though the TV is working for the last 3 days (put around 6 hrs) , I was concerned and insisted either sending it in for a replacement or getting a price match with Best Buy (Schaumburg) which had the same TV in store for a discounted 299 USD (only 1 item non open box). Amazon CC decided to give me 25 USD credit for my problems but all i got was a 5 USD promotion credit for my troubles. Come on Amazon you can do better than this.Will update on performance on the TV within a week or so. Did I say for the money this TV was brilliant.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: SpartanManny
Reviews.Content: Samsung seems to make a great tv for the money.  Great picture and sound.. This 32" was a great fit for our bedroom.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: A J L "Silver Fox"
Reviews.Content: Nice and simple TV with great picture quality. reasonably priced. if you want a good basic 32 inch TV, this is it

Reviews.Title: Ordering a television via the internets?
Reviews.Author: Nicholas R. Hartman
Reviews.Content: My wife hates television. Not just the content, but the actual device. Purchasing this television took years of lobbying and legislative effort. But like all landmark decisions, this was worth the wait.My only reservation was buying a television via the internets. During an afternoon of research, I discovered that this television had a great reputation. At least according to the reviews on this fine site. Maybe Costco carries this model, but I'm too cheap to pay for a membership. Also, I don't need 32 blueberry muffins that could house a large Hobbit family.My greatest concern was the transport. Would the television arrive in pieces? Would UPS employees play Dance, Dance Revolution on the box out of sheer boredom? Fortunately, none of this was an issue.The packaging was fine. And it comes with all of these tiny, cardboard Chinese throwing stars. I didn't throw them away because they'll make excellent firestarters come winter.Setting up the television was easy as well. I agree with other reviewers about ease of setup. A word of caution, however. I panicked when Youtube didn't appear on my menu screen.This pissed me off. The whole reason I bought this television is because I wanted to exercise my God-given right to be unproductive and spend large swaths of time watching people walk into sliding glass doors and also come to the realization that Russians are terrible drivers with no regard for pedestrian safety. But not to worry. Your television isn't broken. It just needs a software update. Problem solved.Other reviewers also pointed out that the resolution needed some tweaking out of the box. Personally, I thought everything looked great, but I made some adjustments and the picture quality is amazing.And the best part is that my wife saw Game of Thrones on this beauty and she's much more willing to pull up seat beside me now.May this television bless you and keep you. Amen.

Reviews.Title: tv
Reviews.Author: Courtney Salmon
Reviews.Content: Got this TV for my parents. Easy to set up and attach to their antenna line. Channels come in great.

Reviews.Title: What a picture!
Reviews.Author: A Bauer
Reviews.Content: I love this TV. Setup was a breeze, with no problems connecting it to my wireless hub, my cable, my blueray..... You have to mess with the controls a while to get the picture you think is best, but then WOW!  HD channels are holy cow good, as are DVD's.  Simplest setup with new technology / connections ever! I bought one for my parents, too, and they just love it.  They're watching their MLB games through the MLBTV.com subscription. Works and looks perfect.

Reviews.Title: comparing my previous 42 in Flat screen tv to the newly perchased UN46EH5000 samsung
Reviews.Author: Don Oakley
Reviews.Content: i only had one problem with the former 42 inch flat screen TV that i replaced with your Samsung..and that was the sound, it never met my expectations from the 1st day i turned it on ..But from the very 1st click of the "on " switch of the un6EH5000 samsung the sound was clear and i only needed 1/2 the volume on the volume bar to satisfy my bad hearing problem , i have put the wireless head phones in the cabinet..all in all iam very happy with the new Samsung ,but will have to wait awile to be absolutly sure ...Oak 989...aka....Don

Reviews.Title: good picture
Reviews.Author: bill
Reviews.Content: has a slightly better picture than my vizio although not until you tweak it not hard to do many of the tweaks people give you help but may not be perfect due to your cable delivery system

Reviews.Title: good tv
Reviews.Author: amazon slave
Reviews.Content: I bought this for christmas and actually followed the reviews from Consumer reports. The Tv was purchased and a few days later I noticed Amazon had this tv on sale. I  contacted Amazon and was refunded sale price.The sound is actually not bad for a flat screen TV. I like the energy star rating and don't feel as bad when I leave it on.  It also has all the connections that I needed for cable DVR etc.The picture is not as warm feeling. (best way to describe it) compared to the TV I have in the front room. This Tv seems a little too bright looking or pale. Its not bad just being picky. I tried to adjust but can't get it any better.otherwise the tv has been easy to work with and I have not had any problems with it.

Reviews.Title: I absolutely love my new TV
Reviews.Author: suzie1
Reviews.Content: It has a beautiful picture, very clear and wonderful color. So glad I made this purchase and would definitely recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: excellent tv.  some difficulty following set up instructions
Reviews.Author: Sol
Reviews.Content: product arrived in good condition. initial assembly basic connections unremarkable. product has many options which required me to call mfg for assistance. samsung and amazon tech support failed to solve my problems. but dish network installer very helpful and solved all problems.

Reviews.Title: Meets my needs
Reviews.Author: hulithedane
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a replacement for a 5-year-old Samsung LCD 32" TV that had power control problems and finally bit the dust.  I found the instructions for set-up and operation satisfactory and used other reviewers' recommendations for fine-tuning the set-up.  The colors are vibrant and the sound satisfactory.  What I miss is the sharpness of picture/outline that I had with the old LCD TV, but I'm getting use to the characteristics of LED.  All in all, it's a pretty good TV for a decent price.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV, but a bit thicker than competitors' models..
Reviews.Author: Brett
Reviews.Content: A bit thicker than competitors' models.. This is around 3.8" deep, versus competitors of the same size and price range being around 3.1", so if that matters to you, then this may not be the right TV.  Picture quality is great (Samsung does a great job with picture quality).  It is surprisingly light-weight.. it uses what I believe are M4 screws for a wall-mount bracket.I bought this particular set from amazon warehouse deals, which was advertised to be in great shape but just missing some screws.  Unfortunately, the entire bezel was scuffed/scratched up so I returned it.

Reviews.Title: great for gaming
Reviews.Author: jessica walls
Reviews.Content: I bought the tv for my sweetheart to use as a computer monitor. He seems to like it. He plays online games and he hasn't complained once :)

Reviews.Title: good quality. good price.
Reviews.Author: R riley
Reviews.Content: Nice monitor. Really hard to find a quality 32 inch at a good price. Seems like the smaller monitors have become a niche market.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH5000 32-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV (Black)
Reviews.Author: William P. Wallace
Reviews.Content: Hated to lose the Sony Bravia (found a new home for it, even though it's damaged), but the Samsung is a good replacement.  CR top rated in it's class.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: great picture quality and sound that i crystal clear.  I use mine for gaming mainly and i would have to say that it is unmachted

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: dchevy2003
Reviews.Content: What a nice TV.  The picture quality is wonderful and the sound is very good, too.  I have owned many different TV brands over the years and this is my top One pick.

Reviews.Title: nice TV
Reviews.Author: noltervetter
Reviews.Content: Great value. This TV has absolutely met my expectations. I like how it plays mpg and avi files straight from USB flash drives.

Reviews.Title: unbelievable picture quality
Reviews.Author: Neal Pelsor
Reviews.Content: built in speakers are terrible but the picture quality is top notch.  It could use more than 2 HDMI ports

Reviews.Title: DOA
Reviews.Author: justin
Reviews.Content: Unit was dead on arrival. Contacted seller (Amazon) and they instructed me to contact Samsung, even though it was purchased less than 4 days prior. The TV was sent back to Samsung about a month ago, still no word on when it will be back.I purchased a second unit from another retailer and the TV itself is fantastic, once you calibrate it properly.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV
Reviews.Author: Hurricane
Reviews.Content: You made it so simple to get a new TV. It was delivered and set up. I didn't have to do a thing. I love the picture, both the size and the clarity of picture. The colors seem so much better than my previous set. My family recommended a Samsung and, in fact, my grandson picked out this set on amazon.com and sent me a link. He is dependable and knows his electronics so I purchased it. Tax refund well spent. Kudos to Samsung and to Amazon for this beauty !!

Reviews.Title: Great TV for a Great Price
Reviews.Author: Scott Statson Jr
Reviews.Content: After searching several stores and spending several hours shopping online for the perfect TV, I didn't know if I'd ever find the one I so desperately was searching for. Then I came across the Samsun 1080p 46-inch LED HDTV.I've had it for about 6 months now and put it through the test. It's gotten a sufficient amount of use. The stand it comes with works great, and it also has the capability of being mounted on the wall. (I now have it mounted to my living room wall.)Sleep timer works great too! <-- I've used this feature a lot!Overall a great TV for a great price! Cannot go wrong.

Reviews.Title: nice tv
Reviews.Author: MINWOO L.
Reviews.Content: really mystyle~ good, nice product, installaton is so easy, and quallity following priceis so good . i boght black friday~

Reviews.Title: Run around from Samsung
Reviews.Author: OB "OB"
Reviews.Content: Received only 7/8 screws for stand.  First customer service rep hung up on me. Second supervisor couldn't help me because the serial number printed on the box was missing a letter.  Her supervisor couldn't either.  Got the full serial number, and now Samsung wants me to mail them a copy of my receipt before they'll provide the missing screw.  Wasted 20 minutes on the phone with 4 class, and another 10 driving to the hardware store.  All for a penny part.  TV looks and sounds good, and was spectacularly packed by Amazon for shipping -- double boxed, 2 day shipping the first which was on Easter Sunday.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Mid-Priced TV
Reviews.Author: Jimmy C. Kent
Reviews.Content: The beautiful picture (right out of the box) required no adjustments. It came with its own HDMI cable, and the stand was very easy to attach. I was able to get everything out of the box, attach the stand, hook up the cables, and have the TV running in less than 30 minutes. I am very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: abilio villarroel
Reviews.Content: muy bueno el equipo

Reviews.Title: Great Christmas Present!
Reviews.Author: Wyte Ryno
Reviews.Content: For the price (black friday) this TV was an excellent buy, beautiful over the fireplace.  Could use another HDMI jack but I knew it had 2 buying it and the pic is great for the money.

Reviews.Title: WAREHOUSE DEAL
Reviews.Author: PHIL HENRY SALAS
Reviews.Content: THIS WAS A WAREHOUSE DEAL  THAT I WAS LEARY OF BUYING BECAUSE THE BOX HAD DAMAGE.... AFTER I GOT THE ITEM IT WAS IN GREAT SHAPE AND MY MOM LOVES THE TV

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "lovetheclassics"
Reviews.Content: This was a refurbished tv, and it works fine. It's a perfect size for our large living room. My dad and his wife are retired and they watch tv most of the day. They can see and hear it very clearly, and are very pleased with it.Next will be an upgrade to an HD cable box, which will make the picture even better.I would definitely recommend this tv to anyone I know.

Reviews.Title: I Love It!
Reviews.Author: Calnacape
Reviews.Content: I'm technically challenged when it comes to cable hookups and hired a professional for setup.  This TV replaced an old bulky flat screen where the motherboard died.  It serves as a bedroom TV and I am very pleased with the picture and sound quality.  I would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: BEAUTIFUL!
Reviews.Author: DENISE
Reviews.Content: The picture quality on my new TV is great! It was surprisingly easy to install - I really do hope it lasts a long long time!

Reviews.Title: Great TV specs/features for the price.
Reviews.Author: Frank C "What is not to love about Amazon?"
Reviews.Content: So far so good, own this unit for about 7 months now and no issues.  The purchase of an optional Logitech wireless keyboard helped alot in getting around the smart menu options so consider it, $20 at Amazon or Staples.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT !!!
Reviews.Author: valerie cross
Reviews.Content: picture great cool features I filled a mini 250G usb freeagent to it so I can watch video without  connecting to a computer

Reviews.Title: Great quality
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: TV was great, nice HD screen and large enough for my bedroom. I decided to return in favor for the samsung smart tv - pretty much the same thing with more functions for a few dollars less. I also recommend this if you just want a traditional tv.

Reviews.Title: Love the size
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Bigger is better. In this case, it's the best. I have several Samsung TV's and never had a problem with them. Great Brand.

Reviews.Title: fuzzy picture
Reviews.Author: Gwen Vaughan
Reviews.Content: Poor quality with a fuzzy picture despite HD cable and service. Very highly disappointed considering it is a Samsung product

Reviews.Title: IT'S A GREAT TV
Reviews.Author: Dan Dotson
Reviews.Content: This is my second TV. The first one had lines in it, while the second TV is great, I just love it. The picture of the first TV had vertical lines on the screen. Not all the time , but when they where there it's very annoying. The new TV is very good and refreshing.

Reviews.Title: Failed within a few months.
Reviews.Author: RichardNYC
Reviews.Content: It is a decently priced TV but four months after I purchased it, it failed, with the picture on the right half of the screen disappearing.I researched this problem using Google for this model of Samsung TV and apparently it is somewhat common for this model.Those reviews suggest that the solution is to rap moderately hard on the side, suggesting an intermittent connector of some sort.Indeed that seems to help temporarily but long term I can't be whaling on my TV every time I want to watch it.Outside the Amazon warranty so now I must deal with Samsung, I guess.

Reviews.Title: $400 dollars worth of happy
Reviews.Author: warren mahan
Reviews.Content: Very pleased! I was nervous about ordering electronics over the internet, but our daughter told me to join the 21st century. Evenwith a 5 year warrantee, I saved over $400 by purchasing through Amazon for the exact same make and model sold at our local Radio Shack. I try to buy local, but not for that amount of savings!

Reviews.Title: Great...as a TV
Reviews.Author: Charon
Reviews.Content: Works as advertised. I also wanted to hook up a computer to this same screen and had a very hard time getting the colors correct. Spent a good couple hours trying to figure out how to make it acceptable. For one thing, I had to turn the Sharpness to 0 in order to get rid of the grainy/sandy look it generated. I thought that was odd. The highlights seemed over blown. Researched a bit online till I found some decent settings to try out. I know it's not the PC because this is replacing an older 24 inch Samsung that worked great without such issues. Color is now passable on the HDMI input. I guess I'll keep it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Brian Mick
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love it! Beautiful picture, excellent quality, all in all the best TV I have ever had the pleasure of owning/watching!

Reviews.Title: Samsung one of the top rated tv's.
Reviews.Author: Larry D. Toole
Reviews.Content: Samsung has proven again why their top rated with this tv it get an excellent picture, true color,sharpness level great and easily programed.

Reviews.Title: Sam EH5300
Reviews.Author: Dee
Reviews.Content: Rec'd EH5300 as a sub for above - same except with WiFi feature.  Unit is nice looking, light, and just the right size for our smaller family room.  Not difficult to set up using supplied remote.  Picture quality is excellent (especially with HD material) except when viewed off-angle.  Internet connectivity established with no difficulty.  Sound leaves a bit to be desired, so am in the search for 2.1 sound bar.  Very satisfied with this unit.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I expected it to be.
Reviews.Author: Denise
Reviews.Content: Glad that it came within the projected delivery window. My only complaint would be that the delivery person just left the television on my front porch, which is outside for everyone to have access to if they wanted to.

Reviews.Title: use it as a monitor, not that good
Reviews.Author: Homer Jay Simpson "Homer J."
Reviews.Content: i use it as a laptop monitor. not sure if the reason i dont like it is the frequency rate (60) or the pixel density, but i do not like how grainy the pictures/websites look. too much hassle to return, so i am just keeping it. would not purchase again for a laptop monitor.

Reviews.Title: good item.
Reviews.Author: kuon ojeong
Reviews.Content: I love this LED HDTV.Performance is better than i expected..when you try to place a TV at your bedroom, this TV will be good for itthank you.

Reviews.Title: New TV for guest room
Reviews.Author: K. M. Warren
Reviews.Content: Top quality item; easy to install. This is the 'little brother' to the Samsung 60" we ordered from Amazon just before the holidays.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Truth Lady
Reviews.Content: This TV is exactly what we wanted. It has a sleek design and excellent picture. I would highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: A good Tv and a good value
Reviews.Author: Petunia
Reviews.Content: I chose the Samsung 46-inch TV set because I wanted a larger screen and one capable of receiving HD and digital channels. Also, My former TV was a Samsung product and I was very satisfied  with its performance. I did not need a "smart" TV so am very happy with my choice. I do wish that it had a clock on the sceen, however, a feature I liked on and early set.

Reviews.Title: So far, great performance!
Reviews.Author: Al Dexter "Big Al"
Reviews.Content: I have a 46" Samsung that has performed really well for the past three 'pplus' years and this addition to our bedroom with the 32" is looking very good. I have yet to use my 'set-up disc' to get the color, brightness, contrast, etc. calibrated. Very pleased with the performance thus far!

Reviews.Title: Great 32" HDTV 1080p 60Hz
Reviews.Author: Whitegoggles
Reviews.Content: This tv was bought as a second unit for our home.  I selected Samsung because of my past satisfaction with their products, especially their HDTV's.  The price point matched the quality and it arrived quickly and in good condition.

Reviews.Title: ...Now what to do with the old flat screen?
Reviews.Author: M. Thornberry "grins"
Reviews.Content: Hard to believe that we used to peer at a tiny 32 inch screen!  The 40 inch fits our small living room perfectly, the picture is clear as a bell rung on a cold, clear day, and it works with Google Chrome.  And the price was right.

Reviews.Title: Samsung tv
Reviews.Author: lois stern
Reviews.Content: Anyone who needs this size tv, it is good looking and works well and is a good brand. Get one!

Reviews.Title: Thing is great
Reviews.Author: Matthew Daly
Reviews.Content: No dead pixels and my parents love the TV. It was a good Christmas gift. Either way this TV is solid.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: GBooher
Reviews.Content: Very good picture easy set up........I have had good results with Samsung TV's.Would recommend Samsung products have good results across their line of products.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32 inch TV
Reviews.Author: Phil Rosar
Reviews.Content: Looked up the reviews on Consumer report., which rated this TV very high. It was easy to hook up and has a nice picture

Reviews.Title: Happy I purchase this Samsung !
Reviews.Author: Judi Gerstein
Reviews.Content: I already have a 50" Samsung and love it.  This 32" is just as wonderful. Great picture and sound quality. It was difficult for me to find 1080 LED HDTV for a specific counsel in our living room. This was perfect.  The great quality, fast prime delivery.  All that a person would expect from Samsung. We are very happy with this TV.

Reviews.Title: great purchase!
Reviews.Author: Tapanga Lee
Reviews.Content: And very easy to hook up! This '32 inch television is nice for the bedroom (that's where I put my tv) and I just love it!

Reviews.Title: Samsung is a great purchase & price right.
Reviews.Author: Virginia Kostige
Reviews.Content: Grandson said it has a great picture, he isenjoying it very much. He is very pleased with the t.v.

Reviews.Title: Sleek design, beautiful display
Reviews.Author: DcommaJ
Reviews.Content: I bought this over Cyber Monday 2013 and it's been working great for the past 3 months. I love the sleek, minimalist design and Samsung has done a great job with the UI interface. Perfect display, in my opinion.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: Benjamin
Reviews.Content: Looks great! It's about 3 inches thick (Which is way more than I thought it would be), but it's an awesome TV. Happy I bought.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 50 inch TV
Reviews.Author: Donna P. Burgess
Reviews.Content: I was very pleased with my new TV.  It is all that I expected.  It was packaged well, no damages.  I looked for the best price and got it through Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: S. Roby
Reviews.Content: Great picture, clean and smooth. This is my first LED HDTV and I absolutely love it. I love the buttons built on the TV itself to change the channel and source etc. They look better than on a standard TV and blend right in to the TV's form.

Reviews.Title: Second one!
Reviews.Author: ginnyw
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my partner who was watching a 45 year old set. I had already purchased one for my rec room, and this exactly fit the space he had available. He loves it, especially the sound quality - he's a tad bit deaf. The only issue we had was a few self-tapping screws missing from the box. These were easy to substitute, and the set is easy to assemble.

Reviews.Title: Works fine for XBox.
Reviews.Author: banne
Reviews.Content: I had hoped to use it as a computer monitor also but haven't located connecting cords for an older computer yet.

Reviews.Title: LIKE IT, BUT DON'T EXPECT GREAT SOUND QUALITY
Reviews.Author: JB
Reviews.Content: Several reviews have stated no sound bar is necessary, but I disagree. I don't consider myself an audiophile, but the sound is about what you would expect from today's built-in  flat-screen TVs.I just ordered a sound bar for $80.00 & should be in good shape after that.

Reviews.Title: Great resolution
Reviews.Author: Leticia D. Rojas "Chauncita"
Reviews.Content: The picture is impeccable and the sound is pretty good, too. There's no wifi but I connect my a Google Chromecast with this and all the features I need are there seamlessly. This is a great small/ medium bedroom sized TV.

Reviews.Title: Great Basic Set
Reviews.Author: G. M. MCNAIR
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my small living room to fit in an entertainment center I loved and didn't want to replace. It fits perfectly into a unit designed for a 27 inch standard (CRT) television.The picture is phenomenal on this set...by far one of the brightest and clearest pictures I have seen among LED tvs. The menu and remote are easy to use, and setup was simple. I use it for my DVD player and my Roku, along with digital off the air signals.  All inputs produce a nice picture.Sound is good for a smaller TV, although if you are a movie buff, you might want to consider a sound bar or a connection to an external amplifier and speakers. I use a small T-amp (bought here on Amazon) and a set of bookshelf speakers and then the sound is very nice. Note: the 3.5 mm audio out jack on the back of the TV isn't made for headphones...it is a line out jack, just like you would have on a stereo component. One inexpensive option instead of a soundbar or amp, would be to get a set of decent computer speakers with a sub. They should plug right in, and work fine, albeit, you would have to occasionally get up and adjust the volume. One of the very few shortcomings with this set.It also has a USB port and media player built right in for playing your own movies and music. I have an SD card and card reader plugged in there with a large portion of my mp3 library. It works well and plays well, but has no extra frills.Overall, I am very pleased with my purchase. The set is basic, and smaller, but that is exactly what I was looking for. It is perfect for a smaller room, has a great picture, decent sound, and enough features to make it fun and useful. At the selling price, the set is a great value and a solid performer.

Reviews.Title: THAT'S hi-def?!
Reviews.Author: Miss Dog
Reviews.Content: My last tv was a slacker!  AMAZING picture!  The quick sound and color options are incredible.  (I stream via Roku)  THANK YOU!

Reviews.Title: Great picture, easy setup!
Reviews.Author: Bill Doyle
Reviews.Content: PROS: Great picture after a few tweeks, sound is loud and clear.CONS:  None so farOther thoughts :  Only have a couple of Toshiba LCDs that are  two and three years old to compare it to.

Reviews.Title: Great 2md TV
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I would definitely reccomend this product.  Great for use as a tv in our spare room.  Nice to send the grand kids bacvk there when we want to watch something else

Reviews.Title: Excellent small HDTV
Reviews.Author: Ernie Fordham
Reviews.Content: This is a great small HDTV and a very good buy at the price.  The picture is excellent and was very easy to customize to the look we like. The only thing lacking to a very minor degree is the sound quality from the TV speakers. It is not bad but I use additional external speakers to give it the high quality I get from my larger Samsung unit in my family room.  I would definitely recommend it and would buy another one if I need a 32" unit.

Reviews.Title: Fine TV
Reviews.Author: littleag
Reviews.Content: This unit has fine definition, nice colors, and uses the whole screen without distortion.  We have had no problems with it so far.

Reviews.Title: nice sharp picture
Reviews.Author: Smoky McPeat
Reviews.Content: Sound is adequate, not great, picture is nice and sharp, I wish it had 3 HDMI so could plug in Roku, cable box, and Blu-Ray player.  Had to plug Roku through Component video input.

Reviews.Title: Works excellent, but with one flaw
Reviews.Author: Scott Rice "PASTORFUZZ"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv a few weeks ago and it works excellent.Images from a bluray player are fantastic.However, If you are using the audio out jack on the back for headphones or a receiver,you can not adjust the volume with the tv control or the remote! The volume is factory preset.The volume has to be adjusted using the receiver control.If you are using headphones, you can't adjust the volume at all.If you turn on the tv speakers, the volume works as it should.As usual, Amazons shipping was very fast, and the unit arrived with no damage.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN40EH5000 LED TV
Reviews.Author: K. D. Weaver
Reviews.Content: Great TV ..... Fantastic picture (much better than Vizio) and one won't be disappointed with the picture and sound. Enjoy!

Reviews.Title: A great value.
Reviews.Author: Jeff B
Reviews.Content: It arrived undamaged and on time.  It's got a nice sharp picture.  My wife is happy with it, so I've got no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for bedroom
Reviews.Author: mbones2
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture, and sound is decent for watching in the bedroom. Would recommend a soundbar if you want better, and more powerful surround sound experience.

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: Stormen
Reviews.Content: This is a great tv for the money. Easy to set up and a very high definition picture I believe consumer reports ranked very well for a 32" television..

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Lourdes P.
Reviews.Content: I was leery about ordering a TV online as I always bought from Video Only, but they wanted more money for same TV.  My son setup his new TV set within minutes. Beautiful picture and sound is great..

Reviews.Title: Quality product
Reviews.Author: James Schneider
Reviews.Content: This TV was everything I wanted. Did my research in advance and definitely wanted a Samsung. This model had all the ports I needed and is compact and lightweight as expected. This is my first HDTV and I know that impacts quality but I was actually surprised by how sharp the picture was. I played a couple of my favourite DVD's and can say they never looked better.  The delivery time was as promised and the packaging made sure everything arrived in excellent condition. For this price I am very well satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Samsung review
Reviews.Author: Deborah  Lange-Kuitse
Reviews.Content: Samsung UN32 is great for a small space, good picture quality, very easy to install. I even like the little chime it gives when you turn it off, which is helpful to know when you have other devices connected to your tv.

Reviews.Title: Quality
Reviews.Author: D. Swimley "123book456"
Reviews.Content: Great clarity of picture, super easy set up, clear instructions, wonderful packaging.  Sound quality is very good for the size TV.  Easy to use remote.

Reviews.Title: Good but one caveat
Reviews.Author: samuel m. parnell
Reviews.Content: Good quality picture and sound, sufficient controls and easy to set up, use and enjoy. Major disappointment: no headphone jack.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: A. Gift For You "MJG"
Reviews.Content: Great picture for the price.  I have a PS3 so don't need a smart TV, this works great.  Also, this is cheaper than best buy and delivers it right to your front door!

Reviews.Title: Great deal!!!
Reviews.Author: Mario E Rivas
Reviews.Content: This tv has a great picture quality and a good sound for the price and size it is a wonderful deal. My wife just loves it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Randy
Reviews.Content: Very light, good clear picture, plus it had really good reviews. Much better picture than my previous TV. Would recommend it to anybody. Easy to program also.

Reviews.Title: Good Quality for price
Reviews.Author: Rosemary Conte
Reviews.Content: Although this model didn't have exactly what we wanted for "sleep" settings, the picture quality is very good.  I'd definitely recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for bedroom
Reviews.Author: denas
Reviews.Content: We put this in our bedroom, and it is very nice for the price.  It seemed a bit dark at first, but once we changed the lighting from standard to dynamic, that helped a ton.  We also purchased a sound bar from Amazon that really makes the TV boom, but if you are putting this in a small room, then the sound should be fine on it's own.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Sheila S. Henry
Reviews.Content: After reading Consumer Reports 2014 Buying Guide, I decided on this purchase.  The HD picture is fabulous.  Setup was a snap.  The only drawback is, I can't get my face off the TV.  I found new channels I never had before.  Sound is great, especially after I got my cable HD box.

Reviews.Title: Can't complain one bit!!
Reviews.Author: R. Allen
Reviews.Content: Got this for the kid's room this last Christmas.  VERY quick shipping.....less than 24 hours in this case.  TV has a great picture, easy to put the base on too.  Like the title says, can't complain on bit!!

Reviews.Title: I like it a lot.
Reviews.Author: popovers
Reviews.Content: TV is considerably larger than the 22" we had.  My husband has degeneration of his vision and the larger print and picture is a gift for him.  The sound system is certainly louder and better balanced because his hearing is poor and he refuses to wear his hearing aides. I think I need to work on clarifying the picture and the background picture blurs with motion on the film. I believe if I work with the settings some more I can lessen it.  On the whole, we both like it.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Lorna Harris
Reviews.Content: Being single,I had to learn to do a lot of things myself!My tv was easy to assemble!I also connected my extra goodies with no problem.The Quality of my tv is excellent!

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: James H
Reviews.Content: best tv i have ever had beautiful picture and sound nothing better. the only thing that i see wrong with it is the size wish i could have gone bigger.

Reviews.Title: Love this large screen tv. Samsung is great.
Reviews.Author: Rosebud
Reviews.Content: Never thought I'd buy a tv online, but times have changed. Love it! It has a great touch of red that's attractive and goes with any decor.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Rebecca A. Orsborn
Reviews.Content: The TV is exactly as advertised. It was easy to mount on the stand and easy to connect. The tv has a clear picture and works for what I needed it for.

Reviews.Title: Nice tv for great price
Reviews.Author: ChrisZ
Reviews.Content: This tv was a gift.  It looked great out of the package. The quality of the picture and sound are good. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a small flat screen.

Reviews.Title: OH my, fast shipping! great value!
Reviews.Author: Shelley Riddle
Reviews.Content: This came very quickly...2 days I think!.  The picture quality isn't as good as some of the higher priced TV's but I think it was a great value.  I am still learning how to adjust the picture settings to get the sharpest image.  I was worried the 40 inch wouldn't be big enough for our family room but I like the size.  I don't care to have a giant TV filling up our space so I think it's perfect.

Reviews.Title: Nice television
Reviews.Author: susan McNIcholas
Reviews.Content: The t.v. Is great for the size, 1080p,60Hz,HDTV and price point.  The only disappointing thing is that I had to go out and but a cable to connect it to our HD cable box.  Don't know if I missed that on the ad for the tv, or it wasn't indicated, either way, it is a drag to have to go out and buy something before you even get to try it out.

Reviews.Title: I have not found any fault with itv
Reviews.Author: Emory
Reviews.Content: It is a great TV ,  good picture  just perfect  set it to one of the specs given on another review .  Very good price for it too

Reviews.Title: Great deal and surpasses the 60Hz rating with Samsung's CMR
Reviews.Author: M. Hoogsteen
Reviews.Content: First time we have ever bought a wides screen digital TV. This one is being used in a "common" area or "den" in our condo. It receives signal from the antenna on the building and does as good a job as digital can give. Please note that analog signals were more forgiving and therefore the signal was not lost completely. There would be some signal "snow" but not loss of signal like Digital. The TV programs fine and adding a Samsung Smart BLue Ray/DVD player with WiFi gives the smarts that might be needed. The cost to quality is excellent for this unit.

Reviews.Title: Love my new TV!
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Johnson
Reviews.Content: Samsung is quality to begin with and the size is perfect, the price was fantastic and delivery was exactly on time!  I'm sure I will have many years of enjoyment with this TV.  Thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Great for a smaller set
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Pros- Crisp, clear picture from all angles.  Light weight made it easy to find a swing arm mount without having to pay as much as the TV.Cons- No HDMI hook ups on the back, side only.  Small joystick for channels and volume seems a little fragile

Reviews.Title: Samsung lcd
Reviews.Author: Denny Gaffer
Reviews.Content: The picture on the Samsung is great. But the sound is not very good. Any base at all and the TV sounds bad. Planning to hook up to my amp. after the holidays, so it should be OK after that.

Reviews.Title: Yup
Reviews.Author: Daniel Budd
Reviews.Content: For the price I bought it at, it's a great TV.  I wanted to get something a little bigger, but I settled on the 40-inch.  Haven't had much trouble with the refresh rate as of yet, but I would recommend you look at a 120Hz TV before purchasing a TV with 60Hz.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: hz challenged
Reviews.Content: Great tv, just thought it would be a little slimmer, but still very lightweight.  My experiences buying TV's from Amazon have always been great and this was no different.  Great product shipped in great condition...and they last.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the kids rooms
Reviews.Author: M. H. Self "2atonce"
Reviews.Content: we wanted to get the kids tvs for their room... we did not want to buy the cheapest...but not the most expensive either...this was perfect and we have the top of the line samsung smart tvs in our house... so samsung had a good reputation... the middle of the road is just as good...excellent picture quality!!!

Reviews.Title: TV time
Reviews.Author: donna leonard
Reviews.Content: Very happy with delivery and the picture.  This was purchased for our second home.  As you can tell by the size, my husband picked it out.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous TV
Reviews.Author: Ann Bennett
Reviews.Content: This television was a Christmas gift and was VERY well received!  Perfect size and great picture!  I could not be happier.

Reviews.Title: decent HDTV
Reviews.Author: Paul Londagin
Reviews.Content: Nice price, price was recently dropped, on an HDTV.  Picture is not as clear as some HD tv at times but overall a good tv.

Reviews.Title: 50 inch TV
Reviews.Author: Joan Reckelhoff
Reviews.Content: I love the TV.  Our old one took three people to carry.  It has an excellent picture.  It made a great Christmas gift for us.  The price was fantastic.

Reviews.Title: My tv

Reviews.Content: It makes a wonderful addition to my master bedroom.  I like being able to hang it on my bedroom wall and save some space.

Reviews.Title: 32  inch tv

Reviews.Content: We ordered this tv as a Christmas present, it arrived on time and packed very well,It was a great buy for the value. Unpacked it set it up and the picture is wonderful.We are very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Delighted!
Reviews.Author: J. Hagen
Reviews.Content: This was a birthday present to my husband, and he is delighted with it.  We are amazed by the clarity of picture.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 46 inch 1080 60 hz LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Pam
Reviews.Content: Great picture, good sound, easy to set up, Delivery was a day earlier than expected which was great.  Overall review would highly recommend this TV to anyone ..

Reviews.Title: good all around tv

Reviews.Title: Not to smart

Reviews.Content: For the price it should be a smart tv other wise it is a good performerVery light weight and easy to mount

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV's
Reviews.Author: Thomas Stansbury

Reviews.Title: Great TV For a Small Space

Reviews.Content: I really like Samsung.  The TVs are light, easy to set up and the results are superior.  This TV was set up in a small living room.  The sound coming from the TV speakers was perfect for the room without the need of added speakers.  Outstanding TV!

Reviews.Title: great tv for a great price!

Reviews.Content: Excellent picture and sound!  perfect price for the perfect tv!  Its great for gaming and watching bluray movies.  Samsung had always been my tv of choice.

Reviews.Title: 5 star rating

Reviews.Content: everything I expected from a Samsung tv . great color, good sound  and easy set up, and the price was right.

Reviews.Title: Great choice
Reviews.Author: Salvador Ceballos "veterano"
Reviews.Content: This tv is very simple to install and operate.  Picture quality is excellent for the price,  This is my 3rd samsung tv in 9 years with ZERO problems.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG LED HDTV WONDERFUL!!!
Reviews.Author: Texas wood reclaimer "Texas wood reclaimer"
Reviews.Content: This was a black Friday purchase.  I spent months checking various TV's out. With the help of my computer consultant we selected this one. I wanted a unit that was internet friendly that could be used for a monitor for office work, power points, etc.  It arrived via Amazon Prime, I took it out of the box, followed the simple instructions to install the base.  Plugged it in, after apprx 10 minutes of warm up it worked and continues to work great!  I would give it a 5 star rating after a little more use.  This is my 3rd TV purchase from Amazon, I have absolutely no technical knowledge, this was as simple as it gets.  The size of the TV requires a little assistance from your nearest grandchild (who loves the TV too) to extract from the carton and set up. COMPLETELY HAPPY WOULD RECOMMEND TO ANYONE, this is a 60HZ, if you think you need a 120 or greater that would be the only difference.  Check back w/me in early Feb.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LED TV
Reviews.Author: L. Walsh

Reviews.Title: Good

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful picture and perfect size for my kids playroom

Reviews.Content: Samsung makes great TVs and this one is awesome. Perfect size for my kids' playroom and the picture is beautiful!

Reviews.Title: I'm not much of an electronics fan.

Reviews.Content: But this T V has wonderful clarity. It is also easy to use in its functions.I would recommend it.

Reviews.Content: This is the first television that I have purchased since 1999, and I love it.I had no problem with setting it up to the cable box or the blue ray player.

The picture quality is very nice and it is a nice attractive package.I bought this TV for my parents who only have a DVR and DVD player and don't use extra services like netflix. It was easy to setup and I'm pleased with the picture quality.If you have a need for a lot of HDMI inputs, you might look elsewhere. Otherwise, definitely recommended.

Reviews.Title: TV IS VERY NICE

Reviews.Content: I have had TV for about two weeks. So far so good. Great for the price. I had a much smaller one so this seems huge.

Reviews.Title: Great TV

Reviews.Content: Works great - no complaints - great price for the size of the tv ordered. Would buy it again when needed.

Reviews.Title: Got it for a great price!

Reviews.Content: So far, so good! It was the right price for our budget and was replacing a defective 32" Sanyo that we bought from Walmart during the 2008 Olympics

Reviews.Title: Rating Posted By. Mr Blues

Reviews.Content: Having a hard time with the color on the pictures. Standard and movie . Setting don't stay in balance. You it for the game room, It was a good price on the T.V.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful
Reviews.Author: Aaryn M Noble
Reviews.Content: I love this t v.  All the other reviews are worth reading.  I really liked the reviews that helped with swttings.  it got me started quickly

Reviews.Author: jimmie Roush Sr.
Reviews.Content: Okay tv but not as likable as my other two samsungs.  Difficult to setup on a standard antenna.  Substituted it for another tv I had.

Reviews.Title: Another good samsung product
Reviews.Author: E.A. Love
Reviews.Content: Great product for the price. Not most advanced TV out there (connectivity and features are pretty basic), but the picture is really nice!  Satisfied with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Dangerous Dirk "$"
Reviews.Content: all I needed was a decent HD flat panel TV, and none of the smart features, and this TV hit the spot.  picture is great, I use it for every day TV watching with HD Cable, playing my xbox one, as well as apple TV movies and streaming Netflix through an appleTV.I honestly don't have any complaints with this TV.  I don't wall-mount, so it sits on a glass top tv stand that used to house my 55" sony non-flat panel.  I don't use the speaker, as it's connected to a home theater setup, but the picture is great for gaming and movies.I don't use the remote, because I have a harmony touch remote.

Reviews.Title: Get yours now
Reviews.Author: karen daffner
Reviews.Content: Nice crisp picture. Easy set up. Delivery was terrible. TV was placed behind garbage cans in driveway. No notification of delivery. Was found in the morning as I was leaving for work. What if it had been stolen? I wouldn't have even known it was there.

Reviews.Title: I recommend Samsung TVs
Reviews.Author: Deanna Hoffman
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture! Good sound. Mounted easily. All who see it, ask where we got it. I'm our family area and enjoyed.

Reviews.Title: connection problem
Reviews.Author: Michael Luttbeg
Reviews.Content: Picture fine but had to have uverse come out in order to use volume etc. not technical so maybe a uverse problem however they did indicate problems with sime samsungs

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: Michael Howard
Reviews.Content: Received on time, No problem in installing, very good picture, good quality sound, nice and light, easy to install in the bedroom

Reviews.Title: Awsome Screen/TV
Reviews.Author: theresa
Reviews.Content: Works great with my computer, not to mention as a TV. I would strongly recommend this for you if you game/stream movies.

Reviews.Title: thank u
Reviews.Author: timothy
Reviews.Content: i love my tv i use ever day came in perfect condition an nothing i love the tv n i cant be more thankful. the are no probelms n i beening use it for a week

Reviews.Title: Perfect TV for its price
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: I recently bought this TV for my bedroom. After hours of research, looking for a 1080p TV under $500 with the best possible input delay and reviews, I settled on the Samsung UN40EH5000. The input delay (according to various websites) is probably the best for its size and price. I use this TV with my Playstation 4 and there is absolutely no noticeable delay. 1080p is pretty self explanatory, and the 60hz refresh rate is fine (though it comes with clear motion 120hz or whatever, but I don't use it). I don't use this TV to watch cable, but - as I said - it is perfect for gaming. Even without tinkering with the picture settings, the image was great.Now when I say the UN40EH5000's picture is great, I don't mean 10/10 perfect. Obviously those 4k UHD TV's will destroy this one. I really recommend viewing this TV in person because I don't know if I can give an accurate depiction of the picture quality. I will say this, though: I have absolutely no complaints. Before purchasing this set, I was hearing that LED TV's have terrible blacks that look more blue and green than black. People were telling me to get a plasma instead, but I went for the LED anyway. The blacks are black. I really can't say much more than that. No blue, no green, just black.Now about the panel lottery: much of those hours of research was spent on finding the truth behind the "panel lottery" where Samsung apparently doesn't use Samsung panels in all of its TV's. As one of the other reviewers said, the ts0x and th0x models were the ones with Samsung panels. Unfortunately, this information is a bit dated and I found myself at Best Buy with the option of buying the last UN40EH5000 with an unknown model number. The sticker had been torn off and it was a bit of a gamble to take it home, but I did. It turns out the model number is pf0x or something like that, and, upon further research, it was a Samsung. So I can't really comment on the other models, but the one I got (pf0x?) is a Samsung.The picture and sound quality (surprisingly good) are more than enough for this TV to earn a 5 star rating, but there are a few more extras that make it even better.The TV comes with 2 HDMI ports - one more than I need. A lot of TVs come with 2 or even more, but it's still a nice extra.It should be noted that each and every input gets its own video and sound settings. The settings you save for TV don't have to be the same for HDMI1, HDMI2, Component, etc. This comes in handy because some settings are optimal for some uses but not others.The USB port was a nice surprise. Without knowing how to use it, I plugged in a FAT-32 formatted mini-usb with a couple TV show episodes on it into the port. After pressing the media player button on the remote, the TV took me to the media player where I could play videos, listen to music, or view pictures. From what I've heard, many have had trouble using similar media features on their TV's, so I was surprised when everything worked so easily for me.If that was too long for you people, here's a summary.Great pictureGreat soundGreat for gamingEasy to useNice extrasHere are my settings for anyone interested. Be warned: some of this is out of order.Backlight 20Contrast 100Brightness 44Sharpness 55Color 51Tint 49/51Dynamic Contrast offBlack Tone offColor Space nativeWhite Balance:  R offset 25  G offset 25  B offset 25  R gain 0  G gain 30  B gain 30Gamma (-1)Motion lighting offColor Tone warm 2Noise Filters off (all of them)HDMI Black Level lowMotion Plus offGaming Mode offFilm Mode offI change the settings every now and then, so these are in no way the definitive settings for this TV.

Reviews.Title: To use as a monitor for your MAC...
Reviews.Author: Thais Da Rosa "off-gridder"
Reviews.Content: …you'll have to purchase a 'mini display port to HDMI adapter'; $40.  At least that was what was needed for my 2-year-old MacBook Pro.  Bring your Mac into the Mac store because they change adapters every few years so, older or newer products will need a different adapter!

Reviews.Title: The 1080 high def is noticable.
Reviews.Author: Happy Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is dynamite, colors are crisp and the finest detail is perceptible.  A little more money yields a much better viewing experience.

Reviews.Title: Very Good~~!
Reviews.Author: Yun Jeongmin
Reviews.Content: Fast Shipping!Good Quality!I gave it to my parents...They like it.But it's just a little thicker than other LED TV.Thanks~

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Rowinson Leon
Reviews.Content: Excellent ProductExcellent TV pictures are sharpI like the articleI recommend it because HD and flat screen TV

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Good quality, nice picture. No complaints about it. Have watched sports and general tv on it and it looks awesome!

Reviews.Title: Unbeatable For The Price

Reviews.Content: Everything you want out of an HDTV. 1080 resolution. Great picture quality. Very good sound. Very  Good price. Very happy with our purchase.

Reviews.Title: Clear picture
Reviews.Author: Karen Bolte
Reviews.Content: I liked the TV so far because of its clear picture and sound only have had it 3 weeks before we left for the winter.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for the money!
Reviews.Author: Patricia Evans
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is excellent! The price was right. Wasn't too hard to mount to the wall. Now we fight for this tv in our vacation home.

Reviews.Title: Thought You'd Want To Know

Reviews.Content: Update: Price of TV back down on Amazon, so I ordered a replacement...hoping for a better result this time!Very nice TV...picture, sound, features, styling. But...the screen went black on me on the fourth day and I ended up sending the set back to Amazon instead of to Samsung for repairs. I guess it happens, but not confidence inspiring. Hope you have better luck. Btw, Amazon would only refund my money and not replace the set, I think because the price of the set went up. Would say I was surprised all around on this purchase...thinking the big box stores might be worth a second look!

Reviews.Title: Works Great

Reviews.Content: Excellent TV Easy To Install Great for my needs.  Now we'll see how long it lasts.  I STILL HAVE MY OTHER TV AND IT STILL WORKS FINE..  So Far so good.

Reviews.Title: Decent LED TV

Reviews.Content: I have had for a year so far. Very satisfied with my purchase. Samsung is a good brand. two thumbs-up.

Reviews.Title: Nice Picture

Reviews.Content: I love this TV. The image is fantastic. Before I ordered my speakers, my roommates and I used the TV speakers on this thing to play our music. It was actually not half bad. I was impressed. It was all around decent sound, besides obviously lacking in bass. If you like the price, and you're having doubts, end them. This TV is Tony the Tiger GREAT.Minor note: Avoid using as a monitor. It's an excellent TV, but there are better monitors for the price.

Reviews.Title: i love

Reviews.Content: i love this tv,i got it on time as sheduled and the hooking up was a breeze.and amazon is the best company i've ever shopped on in my life.

Reviews.Title: Just as good as some $450 HDTV's. This HDTV is a Great Deal.

Reviews.Content: Great product. This was the best deal at the time for an HDTV at the time. The TV comes with the ability to run slideshows with photos and play most video types including .mkv, .mp4, and .avi. Look into the adjustments of the TV in another review. Movie video settings and movie sound make the screen come out with less white around the edges and best quality sound as well.

Reviews.Title: Superb quality

Reviews.Title: This is a keeper.

Reviews.Content: My wife has this in her workout room and just loves it. The picture is great and Blu Ray stuff looks superb. So far, so good

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: gabbygirl
Reviews.Content: Loved this TV right out of the box. We didn't do any tweaking of any of the settings. People comment what a clear and perfect picture it has.

Reviews.Title: This is our first flatscreen and we LOVE it!

Reviews.Content: Great picture, easy to set up and we got it for a steal! Well worth the price! We have been looking at purchasing a flat screen for awhile and settled on this because of the great reviews and value and we have not been disappointed at all.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 40" led tv
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: Grest picture, ease of use. Simply plug and play. Samsung is an exceptional maker of quality TV's. You can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV for the bedroom and Gaming
Reviews.Author: Robert Buffington
Reviews.Content: Nice deal on a really sweet tv. Put it in my bedroom and the picture is really crisp and clear. It looks better than my 50' Panasonic Viera Plasma

The colors are fantastic and the tv looks nice. It's a basic tv without all the extras. I like Samsung products and this one is another good one.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture, easy install.

Reviews.Content: I compared the Samsung with others with similar features and it had the best picture quality. We replaced a 32 inch Samsung, which we moved to another room and if the new one is as reliable we will be very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful picture!

Reviews.Content: Easy setup and very light weight. Beautiful picture. Haven't figured out how to hook my Xbox up with the HDMI, buuuut I also haven't read the instructions. Great TV!

Reviews.Title: Great Value!

Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for my sister and she is really happy about it. Picture quality is amazing and real value for money. Although the sound from this TV is not that great and you might need a good speaker system.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Tim H.
Reviews.Content: I love this TV.  I got it used, but it looks new.  I think the only issue was that the box had been marked up... and that's trash once I get the TV setup.

Reviews.Title: A great little TV
Reviews.Author: Gregory Baumel
Reviews.Content: Great for the little kids or a smaller room. Movies look great. Great pic. Delivered perfectly. I can recommend this TV highly.

Reviews.Title: OK, but not great
Reviews.Author: uncle-buck
Reviews.Content: We've had this set for a week now and the picture quality is just not that great despite lots of tweaking. Input devices are a TIVO Premiere DVR with Comcast cable service and a ROKU XD streaming player with Netflix and Amazon Instant Video. Graphics look good, but everything else looks mediocre. Will probably keep the set, but will not buy another one.

Reviews.Title: Love it bought two
Reviews.Author: Dennis Fortman
Reviews.Content: Loved this TV so much bought a second for our bedroom. Replaced a monster 36" JVC tube TV which weighed a ton took two people to move it. This one weighes about ten puonds

Reviews.Title: 32-inch Samsung HDTV

Reviews.Content: We ordered this TV because a consumer reporting laboratory rated it as one of the best.  We found the unit easy to assemble and easy to set up.  Set up and channel search were easy: The TV looked for a connection to cable TV, then searched and located all the channels.  We are pleased with the picture quality and color rendition.  Thus far, the unit seems to operate very well--and, according to the documentation, it uses less energy than any other similar TV.

Reviews.Content: I've been using it as a monitor for the last 3 months now. I won the lottery and got a Samsung display (read previous comments about monitor codes). Sporting a 2.1ms delay, this thing is easily on par with regular LCD computer monitors. I don't think I'll ever be able to go back to a tiny 26 inch screen again after using this beast.

Reviews.Title: all good but the base is wobbly
Reviews.Author: Samantha L
Reviews.Content: my not-very-handy boyfriend attempted to put this together. when we put the tv into the stand it was BEYOND wobbly. we used my philosophy of "if it doesnt fit, force it." and it seemed to work so far... as in it hasnt toppled off its stand.everything else is great

Reviews.Title: Pretty good

If you are planning to get this for a big room like a livingroom or something, i would suggest something bigger. Its got many settings for your preference, i change them often when I watch movies or play videogames depending on the sound and color I want. I am pretty happy with it and definetly recommend it. One flaw is that the control takes a few seconds to send the signal so it is kind of slow... but its not that big of a deal.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV for the price paid.
Reviews.Author: D. L. MILLER
Reviews.Content: We purchased this television for a "kid cave" for our grandchildren.  Set up was very easy and as far as I'm concerned, the picture quality is just as good as my Sony that cost over $1000.00.  No complaints at all.  Will probably purchase another in the near future.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Margaret Ashley
Reviews.Content: This is my first new TV in several years.  I like it's clear, sharp picture, and making changes to the basic settings is easy...even for a non-techie like me.

Reviews.Title: A Few Days In - Seems Good for the Price
Reviews.Author: F. Barker
Reviews.Content: I was able to get this TV assembled and displaying Verizon (FiOS) audio/video pretty quickly.  The sound was surprisingly good.  As for the video, I'm still evaluating.  Every now and then, I've noticed that the picture does not seem to be keeping up with even moderate action; it looks as though the frame rate is far too slow.  The unit looks too small to replace the tube TV that it was intended to replace, until I turn it on, and then the picture is plenty big from the approx. 8 feet from which we view it.  There is noticeable reduction in video quality when viewing the screen at approx. 30 degrees or more from straight-on.  So far, I think it was a good purchase.  I will update if my opinion changes.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic product 5 of 5
Reviews.Author: Leonardo Sanchez
Reviews.Content: Excellent quality...super fast and easy usb connection media system...excellent image clarity....i'm so satisfied with the item that i buy two instead of one...i'm super excited!!!!!...I love it

Reviews.Title: So far so good.
Reviews.Author: Jack
Reviews.Content: Seems to be working just fine. Nice video and audio quality. The audio settings i like best is "Movie". It has a game mode which I really appreciate too. 5/5

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: BRUCE H.
Reviews.Content: highly recomend we bought this for our spare bedroom and it was a good price for a second or main tv

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: maria c. docampo
Reviews.Content: On the first shipment the TV came damaged and I had to return it.  I was disappointed, however I contacted  Amazon and they sent me a second one within a few days. On the second shipment the TV was in perfect condition. The TV has very good sound, color and HD quality for the money. I recommend this TV if you want quality without having to spend too much money.

Reviews.Title: TV review
Reviews.Author: Tilda Landovitz
Reviews.Content: I don't like the barely audible tones when the set goes on.  I don't like the fact that the sound increases or decreases in increments of one snail pace.  I'd rather see the picture than all the extraneous messages that go on. I can't quite get used to the flat screen.  If you're not directly in front of it you don't see it clearly and sometimes I just want to find a quick weather report without having to sit down in front of the whole screen at once.Otherwise, the set's OK. It works.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Erin E Barry
Reviews.Content: the picture quality does not seem as good as our smaller samsung. but it is works just fine for us.

Reviews.Title: Xlnt
Reviews.Author: JJ
Reviews.Content: very fine picture quality, easy setup... decent sound and super HD picture. Used in a bedroom, it is plenty big... great buy.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: sean purdy
Reviews.Content: I had a very old old TV. And My brother got this for me. It blows my other TV away. If your looking for a good quality TV. This is the one. Its not huge and its not Tiny. Its the perfect size.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV At a Good Price!
Reviews.Author: David C.
Reviews.Content: Since I already own a 26" Samsung LCD HDTV that I am quite happy with, I ordered this newer and larger 32" Samsung LED HDTV. Coming from Amazon.com, via Amazon Prime, it was naturally delivered promptly. My new 32" Samsung TV does everything I expected it to do....and very well!With vibrant colors and crisp display (especially in High Definition), I can't think of one single thing I would change about this TV.IT'S A WINNER.......and I would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: After following tweaking advice, looks great
Reviews.Author: averyniceperson
Reviews.Content: I received the Samsung TV with the correct panels, so this a review on that version. The first thing I did was change all my settings to match the amazon reviews before me and their recommended settings.  It now looks great and functions good too.  It has 2 HDMI's and a component (which you can put composite into to).  I use my Xbox 360 and Wii and they both look great.

Reviews.Title: works very well
Reviews.Author: Karthik Kaimal
Reviews.Content: I bought this a month ago and it is fantastic! It was easy to install and hardy took any time.I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Awsome:)
Reviews.Author: Kristin
Reviews.Content: This product has met all of my expectations, now I'm considering another purchase for my daughter. Thank you very much.

Reviews.Title: This TV is great.
Reviews.Author: L. Howard
Reviews.Content: This Samsung TV is great it is so light I wall mounted it with very little effort.The picture is fantastic I use it with a DIRECTV HD receiver and all of the channels come in Chrystal clear.

Reviews.Title: bday gift
Reviews.Author: ACSmith
Reviews.Content: this tv was a birthday gift to myself.  it was easy to set up and I haven't been disappointed with a Samsung device yet.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Uncle Brown
Reviews.Content: Needed a basic 40 inch TV for a smaller room in the house.  Didn't need a "smart" unit, just a good HD picture.  If you don't need all the apps, this is the best deal around.  Samsung makes great products, this TV included.  When looking at some of the less-known makes/brands please remember that the best price doesn't necessarily mean the best deal.

Reviews.Title: New Samsung
Reviews.Author: jast
Reviews.Content: Replaced the dying tube type model and hung it on the wall. It was a quantum leap in both technology and viewing pleasure!  Very pleased with price and delivery as scheduled.

Reviews.Title: Great so far
Reviews.Author: Robin Michelle Collins
Reviews.Content: Have to tweak the settings a bit but works great. Remote is easy to use. Set up was super easy.

Reviews.Title: Big and Beautiful!
Reviews.Author: JLD
Reviews.Content: i bought this 46" Samsung for our shore home, in the family room which is moderately sized.  What I love about the TV is how light it is, how sharp the pic and good the sound.  A very good TV for a very good price!

Reviews.Title: Exceeds expectations
Reviews.Author: gerry meade
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is excellent and the audio is very good with the various settings. Would recommend this product to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: George W. Gray
Reviews.Content: Has a very clear picture.  Bought for the kitchen and although it is large it fits right into the corner..

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH5000 32-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV (Black)
Reviews.Author: Michael T Gianneschi
Reviews.Content: Samsung UN32EH5000 32-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV (Black)  is a GREAT TV. The picture is unbelievable. It was Worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: overview
Reviews.Author: john macuci
Reviews.Content: It  appears to be a good product for the price.  What is yet to be seen, is the length of performance at present quality.  Good luck to us both.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: WILLIAM H EDLUND
Reviews.Content: Generally satisfied. The picture is not quite as good as our 47 in LG and it would have been helpful to know that I had to purchase HDMI cables before I could the set in service.

Reviews.Title: I am very happy with the purchase of my Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Lloyd Whitehurst
Reviews.Content: Great picture and sound is good. Samsung makes the best TV for cable and HD. I have 4 Samsung TV's and they all have the best HD picture.  Sony, Lg, Vizio, Toshiba none of them have picture that Samsung have.

Reviews.Title: Great TV  The price is great for this size TV
Reviews.Author: Elaine
Reviews.Content: We already have several Samsung tv's and are very happy with the ease of set-upand enjoy the clear sharp picture.

Reviews.Title: Great looking TV for a very reasonable price!
Reviews.Author: opierod6000
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my in-laws who absolutely love it.  its a little annoying that there are no standard audio outputs vs digital but you can easily manage around that.  the picture is great.  Colors crisp and blacks very dark.  I would buy this TV again!

Reviews.Title: Excellent for the price
Reviews.Author: Matt H
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a replacement TV for my bedroom. My only real complaint is sometimes the option to turn off the overscan is disabled for some over-the-air channels. As I use it primarily as a computer monitor, that's not a big deal for me, but others might care.

Reviews.Title: HDTV Just Right
Reviews.Author: JLS
Reviews.Content: Arrived on time and factory packageing was perfect.  Set it up right out of the package with immediate viewing.  We are enjoying beautiful HDTV picture.  We have not experienced any of the review complaints that I read before purchase.  We use it in our bedroom with TV Ears available.  Anyone with a need for a good 32" HDTV, would not go wrong with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Pookah
Reviews.Content: The picture is clear, bright, and the screen seems bigger than it is while watching. The High Def is absolutely fantastic.

Reviews.Title: Fine TV for the money
Reviews.Author: M. Penner
Reviews.Content: Excellent value...bought this on sale though if I waited a bit longer could have purchased an updated WiFi version on special for just a bit more money...that said this is still a wonderful TV....Samsung may be the Tv with the most bang for the buck.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: sam_i
