Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for $500 as part of an Amazon sale. Was initially skeptical of its quality given the price. The TV was indeed not as thin as I'd hoped for. But, after adjusting picture settings multiple times, I LOVE the picture quality. Great vibrant colors, natural picture without being too straining on the eyes. Sound is decent, but most TV's require a separate sound system anyway. Excellent piece for the price!

Reviews.Title: Was worried
Reviews.Author: Luke Campbell
Reviews.Content: I wasn't too sure about the tv being used but it is totally fine. It came with a remote and everything works swell. I've had it for a while now, close to a year now and I'm still glad I bought it used from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Excellent tv
Reviews.Author: Donna Waldahl
Reviews.Content: The TV lives up to my expectations especially the clarity and bright colors. I have been happy with two TVs of the Samsung brand

Reviews.Title: Exceeded expectations.
Reviews.Author: L. Bigler
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my parents. This was quite an upgrade from their old 25" CRT.  They love the larger screen and hi-def picture. Exceeded their expectations.

Reviews.Title: Great!!
Reviews.Author: Straight River
Reviews.Content: It has vivid color and was easy to set up.  The two HDMI ports make it easy to hook up devices.

Reviews.Title: Great T.V. for the price
Reviews.Author: Mary Manos
Reviews.Content: We are very pleased with the picture quality and especially the sound that it emits! For years we've been dealing with other television sets where we've actually had to purchase a separate sound system because it was so bad (realizing we live in the heart of downtown Seattle, I know the noise is loud, but still!). Fast and easy service, highly recommend this company to all buyers!

Reviews.Title: I love this TV
Reviews.Author: safa
Reviews.Content: Amazing TV it was easy to unpack and install. Its easy to deal withI recommend it to anyoneThank you :)

Reviews.Title: Good tv with a good price
Reviews.Author: Paul Stewart
Reviews.Content: This TV for the Price is well worth it. I have not had any problems with it really. The only thing so far is that when watching shows somtimes on certain video apps on my PS3 I will get a white line at the top or bottom of the screen. Have no clue why it is annoying but not a deal breaker. And my PS3 has to be restarted sometimes because it just flashes white every couple seconds. Yet again I do not know if these are issues with the PS3 or my TV, but it is nothing that will ruin your day just a quick restart and you are fine.

Reviews.Title: Very good TV, great price
Reviews.Author: crunch
Reviews.Content: This TV is very light but puts out a beautiful display and reasonably good sound.  It does not have a 3.5mm audio jack so I need a $5 adaptor to stick computer speakers on it, but its really not enough to down-rate the TV.  Lots of the reviews around here have the same settings, which I do not remember now but I can vouch for them working great for games on a ps3.  Some settings people are listing will be too contrasty for network TV in my opinion, so just trust your own eyes when making adjustments.  Luckily the HDMI and TV settings are stored independently.You'll need a screwdriver to assemble the base, and it'll be best to use a standard length one.  I tried to use a 2inch screwdriver and it will not fit the sort of.. half tunnel in part of the base.  I kept forcing it and broke off a little piece of plastic in my base, but its invisible and has no effect on the stand so I'm still happy.

Reviews.Title: Only one to buy.
Reviews.Author: Lee
Reviews.Content: Love it, no problems at all.  It is the only brand of TV that you can get parts for, all the rest are throwaways.  Very easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: So far.....so good!
Reviews.Author: creedmore1000
Reviews.Content: Yes, so far so good. I've had this product since just before Thanksgiving ('12) and it has shown to be absolutely flawless.  Great picture and even greater sound (a must for me as I'm somewhat hearing impaired).  Good price, free postage and thus far excellent quality throughout.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful
Reviews.Author: Amanda Jacob
Reviews.Content: Upgraded from a 720p TV. This TV works very well with my computer (Linux Mint HTPC). I use it to watch Youtube, Netflix, and movies on XBMC.

Reviews.Title: Stellar TV
Reviews.Author: JDCalVino
Reviews.Content: I bought this during the black friday sale and got a great price.  The TV is very sharp.  It mounts easily and has a great picture.

Reviews.Title: style and brand
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: the high definition and easy to operate features are very excellent.  The size is perfect for a 10 X 10 room.

Reviews.Title: great TV for the money!
Reviews.Author: P. Coker
Reviews.Content: This was a great TV investment for an extra set in the home! Pic is great and was very easy to set up. The HDMI-DV1 is a little confusing but once you figure out what you need, it works great. Manufacturers instructions for set-up aren't always the easiest to follow, it would be helpful if Samsung knew that too!

Reviews.Title: NICE!!!
Reviews.Author: AJ
Reviews.Content: Great pic. Love that I can watch movies direct from flash drives. Photos look awesome. Can't say enough about the picture quality. Very pleased for price.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful picture
Reviews.Author: HoopInPNW
Reviews.Content: We have this in our family room and is our second TV.  We have this one wall mounted on a bracket that swings out and lets us swivel the TV so it can be seen from anywhere in the room.  Picture is the equal of our primary TV, a Samsung 52 inch TV.

Reviews.Title: Sweet TV
Reviews.Author: anthony marcelli
Reviews.Content: The picture is wicked clear and Madden looks amazing. I use my TV everyday and all the extras on it rule.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: pako1144
Reviews.Content: This product is excellent. I have been using for quite a while now and I have not had ANY issues with it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Amzn Park
Reviews.Content: I have friends over all the time to watch sporting events. Good sound and great picture. I bought two of them.

Reviews.Title: Excellent High Def TV
Reviews.Author: Michael Rees
Reviews.Content: This model is an excellent high definition television. Although it is fairly basic, and does not have internet or 3-D capabilities, the picture is outstanding. I have not had a large flat screen tv, before this one, and I didn't think the picture would be much different from my old Sony television. But I've been surprised by how much better the picture is. And so far I have had no problems with it.

Reviews.Title: More than met our expectations
Reviews.Author: Mary L. Meers
Reviews.Content: This TV coupled with our Apple TV make a winning combination-- making the living room a much more exciting space.  The audio quality is excellent and we rarely send our audio through our stereo system and its large speakers. We shopped around for a 32-inch LED model before purchasing it. It stood out as the best 1080 32-inch for price and quality.

Reviews.Title: The TV Fits in the cabinet perfetly
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It is a beautiful video, good audio,and great value. I used some of the settings from a previous viewer to make the colors the way I like them. Don

Reviews.Title: It works!
Reviews.Author: The Mathman
Reviews.Content: I purchased it because of the clock. I awaken each morning to it. It actually has 3 options for on/off.

Reviews.Title: Samsung EH5000
Reviews.Author: Bill Jowell
Reviews.Content: We enjoy the new TV.  It still has one minor problem.  There are three channels that do not switch properly with the number pad on the remote.  If on one of those channels and select another with the number pad you can click back & forth.  You can step up through all channels with the remote so since we know how it operates it just a minor inconvenience.  The people at Sasung have tried their best to resolve the issue by  on the phone and e-mail advice.  Long story short  it is a good product that arrived in great shape in a timely fashion.  No complaints at all about the supplier.  Would buy from them again.Bill

Reviews.Title: Very nice product
Reviews.Author: C. P. Hendricks ""Music Lover""
Reviews.Content: We love our new Samsung!  It is a delight to be able to read sports scores, from across our 24-foot living room.  There were a few surprises, with our first "modern" TV, however.  We didn't know how delicate the screens can be (cleaned only with a micro-fiber cloth and NO touching with hands).  Also, our cable provider would charge a hefty fee, for service that improves picture clarity.  Despite these small concerns, we really are happy with our purchase.Patsy & Charlie

Reviews.Title: Awesome image, unfortunately stand does not turn left/right
Reviews.Author: T.S.
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for our guest room, and I love the image quality and how thin it it.After adding Roku3 for just $99, I have an awesome smart-TV at low cost.One thing to watch out for: it looks like the TV would turn sideways on it's stand, but it does not.You may want to warn whoever is using the TV to not try to turn it left/right, because that would surely break the cheaply made TV stand.

Reviews.Title: BUY IT!!
Reviews.Author: Mario Peterson
Reviews.Content: THIS IS A GREAT TV. I LOVE THIS TV. PICTURE AND SOUND ARE DECENT QUALITY. THE PRICE IS NICE AS WELL

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: toplady
Reviews.Content: Thin and light. Great choice and although some of the reviews said the sound can be better, the sound in an average size room is fine. Definitely good value.

Reviews.Title: buen televisor
Reviews.Author: valentin velasquez
Reviews.Content: este tv es excelente para el precio ofrece buena calidad de imagenlos canales  de comiquitas se ven bien debido a los colores, el sonido es bueno las peliculas de accion se escuchan sensacional, tiene diferentes configuraciones que mejoran el aspecto de todos los canales, en fin es un buen televisor

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: ashley bennett
Reviews.Content: The box was in almost perfect shape, and the TV works great.  This shipped faster than expected, which was a pleasant surprise.

Reviews.Title: Great Tv
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: My third Samsung LED to fill up the house. Had problems with inexpensive "no brand " TVs working without a cable box.  This was plugin, program,  and play. Great pictiure also. Finally good price and quick delivery!

Reviews.Title: Smart purchase!
Reviews.Author: legaleagle
Reviews.Content: This is my second Samsung...the first one was for the bedroom.  Love this TV.  It's in a bright room and the picture quality is tremendous.  I compared prices from other stores, but this was the best, plus I didn't have to go anywhere for the purchase and try to get it in and out of a car.  Also, was delivered much sooner than the projected date.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful panel, okay enclosure
Reviews.Author: John A Kelly
Reviews.Content: The image on the panel is beautifully rendered (after a proper calibration).  I use the display in various lighting conditions and the image holds up well in all of them.  The unit is pretty thick, but I'm not hanging it on a wall so it doesn't matter that much.  The stand is a little flimsy and allows for ZERO articulation.

Reviews.Title: A great TV
Reviews.Author: M. Dana
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these for my heated garage. It is very lightweight and the high definition is great, setup is simple. My viewing is from about 10-12 feet away and it is crisp and clear with the default settings. Don't expect great sound, but it is adequete, typical for a flat screen, overall I love the TV and am glad I went with this HD model instead of the 720 model.

Reviews.Title: Excellent picture, good sound
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Love this TV.  Amazon customer service was amazing and the TV has an excellent picture, esp when hooked to FIOS.  Easy setup.  Good sound.  No complaints. The 1080p resolution is worth paying for, better than 720p.

Reviews.Title: Samsung HDTV
Reviews.Author: Colleen
Reviews.Content: The tv overall was very easy to setup and picture quality is perfect.  Purchased the extra long cable to allow room between the box and tv.  Great tv, cannot beat the price.

Reviews.Title: Holy Crap!!!
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I just bought this TV, and I am totally blown away by this TV.  I was playing Tomb Raider on Xbox, and the game just comes to life!  I was also testing other video games I have to see how they could stand up to it.  Well, I was totally blown away by the details of the pixels and how detailed everything is!  If you're on the fence about this one, don't be, you need to buy it!  The audio is far better than I was expected as well.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH5000 32-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV (Black)
Reviews.Author: Sam Valencia
Reviews.Content: Awesome tv for the bedroom was crossing my fingers bc of the reviews that said their TV did not come with samsung monitors. The monitor code was the first thing I looked at when I got it. IT CHECKED OUT! I bought it new from warehouse deals Dont know it the problem comes from used/reman tvs. looks great in the bedroom and the price was great for the 1080p led tv

Reviews.Title: Perfect machine for my needs.
Reviews.Author: William H. Morgan
Reviews.Content: Lots of bells and whistles. More than I can use. Was easy to set-up and install. Size perfect for my viewing area.bought it because of size and brand. My third Samsung in nine years and all working perfectly with no repair costs.W. Morgan

Reviews.Title: good definition and size
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Fong
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my small TV room and  I've had no problems with it since delivery and hook up.

Reviews.Title: GREAT!!
Reviews.Author: Alaric Payne
Reviews.Content: This is such a good TV, I have had it for about a month and have not regretted buying it at all!!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: churd
Reviews.Content: Coming from an old 19" tube, this is like living in luxury and thankful for it everyday! I'm not technically minded so I can't tell you all the specs but I can say, it's got everything we need. I think it's so cool to be able to hook up my laptop to the TV and watch something from the computer on a TV screen...Delivery was awesome fast too! Totally thrilled!

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: Patte "Evans"
Reviews.Content: This TV has an awesome picture and awesome sound! Will probably buy another one soon. Love Prime. Wish I'd purchased it sooner.

Reviews.Title: I got what I wanted, more than happy with this TV.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "kaity_w"
Reviews.Content: There is a little back story to as how I arrived to make this TV my own. I decided last October that I wanted a flat screen TV for my bedroom. For my birthday at the end of November my Father and brother bought me an Amazon lightning deal, a 42" TCL television. When I received it the TV did not work and I had few troubles sending it back to Amazon. Finally after this previous Superbowel and after looking at hundreds of TVs and TV reviews I decided on this Samsung.After four months of searching I am definitely happy with this choice. The TV has an amazing picture, and although I wish it was a little bigger in size, I could not afford a larger one. However for the price this Samsung is definitely worth it. I was able to take it out of the box, easily attach the base, plug it in, and watch TV! Honestly figuring out Frontier's cable box was more of a hassle than the TV. I use this TV to watch mostly crappy cable shows and play on my Wii. I don't notice the lower refresh rate being an issue at all.Overall, I would definitely recommend this to someone in a similar situation to myself. I am a woman in my mid twenties who knows nothing about TV brands but tried getting as much advice from others as I could. I finally decided on which one I liked the best based on reviews here on Amazon and what it looked like in person at my local Best Buy.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Janice L. Barker "Jan B"
Reviews.Content: I rely on Consumer Reports ratings for most of the things I purchase.  This was no exception, and the picture is great, even though I do not have an HD receiver box, which supposedly limits the reception to 720.  The 1080 reception, which would be accomplished with the HD box (may add that in the future and expand my cable service), must be super-excellent.  I am very happy with the set.

Reviews.Title: 40 Inch Samsung HDTV
Reviews.Author: Karen K. Hall "k hall"
Reviews.Content: Looks good, works great.  Good buy.  It was easy to connect.  Picture is great.  As always with Samsung, you feel good about the product.  Of course, buying from Amazon was even better.

Reviews.Title: great picture
Reviews.Author: Lynda K Chaney
Reviews.Content: love the television and the price was pretty good as well  i had another one in mind but waited too long and they were all sold out

Reviews.Title: Good quality TV
Reviews.Author: spdytalk
Reviews.Content: The packaging was good, and the set-up was relatively easy.  I do like that the volume control shows up vertically on the left side of the screen, so it doesn't get in the way of reading stuff written along the bottom of the screen.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH5000 32-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV (Black)
Reviews.Author: Capt Jim
Reviews.Content: The item arrived promptly and was as advertised. I am very satisfied with this item and would order it again from this source

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: theresa wengstrom
Reviews.Content: Great tv, beautiful picture bought for my mother. She loves it  Everything they said about it wonderful.  Easy to hook up.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Christopher Stokes
Reviews.Content: Got my tv and I love it. Great picture quality and and it looks better than how it was described!

Reviews.Title: PRICE?
Reviews.Author: Mark Canzian
Reviews.Content: TV  works very well.. Great picture, LED is better. Have no problems with it.  Would have liked to see the price a little lower.  Priced changed over night.

Reviews.Title: Very good.
Reviews.Author: Joe M.
Reviews.Content: This TV has a great picture and features.  I've read the reviews on Amazon and I don't understand the negative reviews.  I will say,  however, that I agree with the one reviewers comments regarding version codes...you definitely want to get the TV with the TS## or TH## version code (which is what I purchased and the picture/panel is beautiful).  I'm glad that it is Energy Star rated, too.

Reviews.Title: TV is great but the assmbly of the stand there was one of 4 screws that would not catch. I did not think it was worth sending ba
Reviews.Author: EDK
Reviews.Content: TV is great but  during the assembly of the stand there was one of 4 screws that would not catch. I did not think it was worth sending back for that.

Reviews.Title: nice fit
Reviews.Author: Richard Jones
Reviews.Content: I like Samsung products. The slim case fits nicely into my entertainment unit that was built for 32" CRT TV.The color and ease of use is outstanding! But that's just my opinion. Go check one out for yourself and you'll be pleased.

Reviews.Title: I loved it
Reviews.Author: Trevor Lightbourne
Reviews.Content: Samsung lived up to their reputation, tv shows live vivid colors and the sound is great after a little tweaking, overall it is a great buy.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT TV
Reviews.Author: Cathy Canzani
Reviews.Content: Fantastic 1080p picture!  The menu options go very deep to allow you to achieve the best high-def picture possible.I would highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: anthony
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this product.I am thinking of getting a bigger model for the living room..I always love Samsung products.

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: Jose Gumercindo Sanchez F
Reviews.Content: This  LED HDTV is fantastic.In general lines it equipment has a wonderful resolution and the quality of the screen is the best.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME
Reviews.Author: julio cruz
Reviews.Content: THIS TV ITS GREAT LOVE THE SOUND , PICTURE QUALITY AND THE FEATURES THAT IT HAS THIS ONE WAS MY FIRST SAMSUNG AND I LOVE IT

Reviews.Title: happy with this tv!
Reviews.Author: JJ
Reviews.Content: We feel like we finally moved into the 21st century with this flat screen tv. It  replaced a 12 year old Panasonic CRT  TV and we can't get over the difference!!!  In the month we have had it we have had no problems at all with sound or picture. We also got a Blu ray player from Samsung and are looking forward to many enjoyable times with our Samsung "twins"

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Ruth A Jorgensen
Reviews.Content: This was the only thing that I really wanted for Christmas and my husband bought it for me!  I absolutely love it!  It has a beautiful picture and the sound is good!

Reviews.Title: Good bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: Carol Nicholas
Reviews.Content: When our 27-inch television died I ordered the Samsung flat-screen 32-inch TV.  While it is bigger than our old picture-tube television by five inches, the flat-screen seemed smaller (which I'd read in reviews).  Having said that, its picture quality is excellent, the price was lower on Amazon than at any local store, and as a prime member we have free shipping.  I would absolutely recommend this highly-rated television.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture, Surprisingly good sound all thanks to Walmart's Black Thursday Failure
Reviews.Author: Lauren Singletary
Reviews.Content: So I wanted to get the 2012 Black Thursday night 60 inch smart TV from Vizio from Walmart... however that company cannot tell time, or tell the truth. So even though I had my money and was ready to spend it with them, all I got from them were excuses and misdirection.My family and I still wanted a new flat screen TV. We went to Walmart.com and tried to see what else we could get for the money. That is when we saw the Samsung 50 inch. However, I was not real keen on giving my money to Walmart so I checked Amazon and bam they had it and after all was said and done I even spent a little less going with Amazon over Failmart...er Walmart.The TV is beautiful. Crisp picture, surprisingly good and rich sound for a flat panel TV. There is a strong ease of use on the main menu for coaxing the best possible picture for movies, TV  and video gaming. It feels like a whole lot of TV for the money.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: rbarban
Reviews.Content: My second Samsung through Amazon and both have been quality purchases with quality pictures.  I love hooking up my USB drive to this and watching movies!

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: cj72
Reviews.Content: Ordered this as a Christmas gift for my son.  The HD is beautiful and we have had no problems with this tv.  I recommend the seller as well... Very prompt in filling the order.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32" LED - They are really good
Reviews.Author: Fredw111
Reviews.Content: Samsung is the best name for 32" LED tv's at this time and this one lives up to its heritage.  It has a super-crisp picture and the sound is not bad at all.  I would recommend these.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LED TV
Reviews.Author: gt
Reviews.Content: It was everything we expected and a great price for this TV. Yes we would recommend it to others to buy

Reviews.Title: Samsung HDTV
Reviews.Author: Colleen Johnson
Reviews.Content: Great quality TV set to have. We have'nt gotten our cable company to fully hook it up yet so we haven't had a chance to see the full quality of the TV's capacity yet. Would recommend this TV to others .

Reviews.Title: Great picture.  Easy set up.  Perfect for Movies, TV and XBox 360
Reviews.Author: Jeremy Greene
Reviews.Content: High quality LED HDTV with a great picture.  Using almost exclusively for XBox 360 for which it is suited perfectly.  Only gripe is that it needs at least one more HDMI input standard as FIOS and gaming console leave no room for a blu ray player without getting a 3rd party hub/switcher.  Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Great picture quality, good internal speakers
Reviews.Author: JHinCLE
Reviews.Content: This television has met all my expectations, the only thing I wish is that there was one additional HDMI port, I have HD cable, a PS3 and roku I would like to use HDMI for all 3 devices. My fault for not paying attention when I ordered.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: bob m
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is very good. Easy installation. I would recommend this TV to others. Only issue is figuring out how to attach our VCR to it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money.
Reviews.Author: Snu Snu
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the money. I do have to question the inherent design flaw of having to lay the TV flat in order install the stand. Other than that it's a great bang for the buck.

Reviews.Title: So far, so good...
Reviews.Author: lotus
Reviews.Content: This is a large screen t.v, but it is light as a feather.  It was very easy to put together.  The picture fills the entire frame and makes for a pleasant viewing experience.

Reviews.Title: this was a gift
Reviews.Author: jazzman
Reviews.Content: this was a gift for my girlfriend since her tv went out.she loves it.i have been a fan of samsung tvs for a while and thought it was the best choice for her.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Herman
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture and sound.  The TV is all that was expected.  First unit arrived with broken screen.  Replacement was sent promptly at no charge.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV!
Reviews.Author: Barbara Kasch
Reviews.Content: It is everything that it was advertised to be.  I have really enjoyed the TV and it arrived in perfect condition.  Would definitely recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: All Around Great TV Set
Reviews.Author: Matthew Hollowell
Reviews.Content: I ordered the TV about 2 1/2 months ago it got here fast with Amazons free shipping. I have been thoroughly impressed with it so far. In my opinion 32 inches is the perfect size for a tv. I use mine for watching movies and playing xbox. The tv can most definitely handle gaming, I mostly play Halo 4, Call of Duty and Battlefield 3. The tv handles all of them with no problem doesn't stutter or miss a beat. For any gamers who play Battlefield 3, you know that it can get kind of hectic at times but not with this set. Its so easy when sniping, no more having to squint when I wanna find someone. Some of that may have to do with my vision as well. As for movies,everything looks fantastic everything is very crisp and rich. The black levels on this tv are insane, if whatever you're watching or playing goes to a black screen it goes completely black. I usually play and watch movies in the dark so it would happen alot. I actually had to tweak the settings so that I could see when that happens. As for the media hub its sub-par at best. It doesn't really impress me that much and I don't use it tat much anyway since I have my xbox. All around this tv is awesome, definitely a winner in my book. At the time of my purchasing I got it for $334, which is an insane deal.

Reviews.Title: Typical great Samsung quality!
Reviews.Author: BAH
Reviews.Content: I have always been a fan of Samsung televisions. I am not a fan of all Samsung products but I have been so impressed with their televisions that my family members and I have purchased 7 Samsung televisions in the last 3 years. All working great and looking great. I originally wanted a 32" led with 120hz but at the 32" size, I figured it probably isn't necessary. I purchased this television and luckily it was the TS01 panel. I am using cablevision and the HD picture quality is really beautiful. There isn't any need to pay more for 120hz as the 60hz works perfectly fine as there isn't any blurriness with fast moving objects with my sports, movies or video games. Sound? Very happy with the sound as it is rich, clear and has some nice bass especially for a smaller TV. I highly recommend that you keep the SRS TruSurround HD "ON" as it makes it much better. Features? It doesn't have 3d, the built-in wifi, slim led panel, etc. that the more expensive upper Samsung models have but it does have plenty of features like fine tuning, various picture and sound modes, SRS TruSurround HD, LED Motion Plus, Game Mode, etc. It also comes with a perfectly sized remote that is user friendly. The Samsung panel also looks thin, amazing and sleek. It doesn't have that nice glass panel frame that higher end models have but it is still nice. I do have to say that I am a little disappointed in the tv stand that it is plastic rather than glass. Plastic still looks nice but feels pretty cheap and really light. I know that it only comes with 2 hdmi but I really could use another hdmi so I could use a cable box, blu-ray player and playstation 3. I know that Samsung TVs cost a little more than the other models but it is well worth it especially for sale prices. I give this TV a 4.75 out of 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Love it!  Great TV!  Sharp and Crisp!
Reviews.Author: Anonymous
Reviews.Content: Love it!  Great TV!  Sharp and Crisp!  This TV is really top of the line.  Games look real.  TV looks crispy.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: quickster
Reviews.Content: I followed Gordon's advice and tweeked the settings and it is awesome for regular time tv. This is my bedroom tv. I can also have a nighttime setting that I switch to when it's time to dose off which is much dimmer. The first thing I watched was The Avengers on Blu-Ray and it is CRISP and CLEAR. I KNOW I couldn't have found a better tv for the price I bought it for which was around $325.Edit: I just noticed that there is a USB plugin. I usually use home media players for this, but I hooked up my external USB harddrive and it has played every file I've thrown at it. I don't like how there is no option to delete a video after I have watched it, but this built in player is a nice back up since my home media player went capoot on me and so I'm sending it back to the retailer for a replacement which takes weeks.

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: Debi Hiltenbrand
Reviews.Content: Happy, more happy, happiest. Made me happy. It came on when plugged in. What more can you ask for. Happy

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Paul M. Mullin
Reviews.Content: The picture is so clear and bright as we expected when we purchased it from Amazon for the Christmas Holidays.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful picture
Reviews.Author: Philip J. Rheinecker "Phil R."
Reviews.Content: Very nice. I would recommend this television to anyone who is in the marker for an HD TV. Very nice

Reviews.Title: perfect for gaming
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for my 12 year old son for Christmas to go with his Xbox360. It's a nice size for gaming and has a beautiful picture for both his games and watching television.

Reviews.Title: Great quality and picture!
Reviews.Author: KiwiGirl "Globe Trotter"
Reviews.Content: Very easy to set up.  Great picture and sound.  Might have to upgrade my services to get the full benefit of this TV.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32" LED TV
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The product and it's delivery were just as promised, both timely and in description.  The TV is great for a small living room and the picture quality is as hoped.  I would recommend this product for someone looking for a good LED TV on a budget.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for my PS3!
Reviews.Author: Chester Keasberry
Reviews.Content: I've been using this TV solely for videogames and it works great. Most videogames look great, though depending on the settings, some games may look a little jagged-edged. But for the price you pay, it's an awesome purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Charles Wallinger
Reviews.Content: Very happy with our new tv. Great price and great picture. Easy to put together with stand..Would recommend this tv to anyone

Reviews.Title: Love this TV!
Reviews.Author: V.P.
Reviews.Content: Just what we wanted! Easy on-screen setup (directions not needed), excellent picture quality, and looking forward to energy savings from this product! We have been very happy with Samsung in the past and that's why we purchased another Samsung TV!

Reviews.Title: Overall Excellent HDTV
Reviews.Author: Woolly Kundiff
Reviews.Content: Pros: Excellent picture/sound quality( for a 32" TV), Easy set up, light weight, illuminated remote, nice on screen illustrations, nice sleek bezel, great price ( from amazon)Cons: Doesn't have the same build quality as comparable Panasonic viera TVs.

Reviews.Title: Very cute and works fine
Reviews.Author: chuck khan
Reviews.Content: It works fine and so far has no issues whatsoever.Very reliable, nice picture resolution.Good looking console.Above all so no issues.

Reviews.Title: Very good TV
Reviews.Author: LES PRIMMER
Reviews.Content: very good tv.  bought a 46" samsung a few years ago and this one in just as good.  Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Spectacular
Reviews.Author: MzKrownRoyal
Reviews.Content: Brand new...it was like new listed. I love my tv. Thank you Amazon.  It's clear.  True to size and it was less than $600!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Jessie Oh
Reviews.Content: I use this TV in the bedroom; it is a good size, at least for my room; not too big, not too small. It is very light and easy to move around. It is also nice and thin so that there's plenty of space on my dresser (where I keep the TV) for other odds and ends.

Reviews.Title: 32-inch HDTV
Reviews.Author: Happy in Ohio
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied with the Samsung 32-inch HDTV. I was able to use earlier reviews to adjust the TV settings to come up with a great picture quality

Reviews.Title: A very nice Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Lolo
Reviews.Content: Who gets a 32" TV anymore?  Me!  I love Samsung and this TV is no exception.  Highly recommended.  The picture is very good.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32-inch 1080 LED TV
Reviews.Author: FYI
Reviews.Content: Great TV with excellent picture quality. The perfect size for the space I had available. Easy to set up. Plus I got a great deal.

Reviews.Title: perfect tv
Reviews.Author: corvette fever "circa 1972"
Reviews.Content: This new 5000 series is perfect for what we needed. A present for aging parents.  They love the big screen the sound is much better than the Samsungs made a couple years ago.  Since they only watch TV, no gaming or 3D this TV fit the bill. FInally a TV for just watching programs and we didn't pay for  features they won't use .  They did upgrade to HD which they are enjoying.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Myqroft
Reviews.Content: Worked right out of the box, great sound, easy to mount, crisp, clear video. It looks great and works great. I recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Samsung T.V.
Reviews.Author: sherry christiansen
Reviews.Content: This was what I was looking for and it didn't disappoint me. The picture and sound is good. I use it as a second t.v.so it isn't hooked up to HD and still has great picture.I checked Comsumer Reports and it was their pick. It was delivered sooner than at first posted, which was a nice surprise.

Reviews.Title: Love my new TV
Reviews.Author: Gunther Harman
Reviews.Content: This new Samsung television is easy to operate and has a very clear picture and the sound quality is wonderful.  Highly recommend this television.

Reviews.Title: Good Tv
Reviews.Author: Ragavendran Sivakumar "Ragav"
Reviews.Content: I like the TV ,pictures are great and for the $$ i paid i think this is a good buy

Reviews.Title: Overall, pleased.
Reviews.Author: Olive "Oceandreamer"
Reviews.Content: Our Sony 55inch TV decided to quit one afternoon right in the middle of a football game. Repairmen came out but could not fix it because it was "too old." we got it four years ago! The replacement we bought is smaller but still a good TV. The picture seems a little dark sometimes but I'm not sure if it is because it's smaller than what we are used to. As always, Amazon has amazed me with their outstanding service! Kudos to a company that consistently goes above and beyond in customer service.

Reviews.Title: Nice monitor
Reviews.Author: Darren Runquist
Reviews.Content: Currently using as a primary computer monitor and it's working extremely well.  Received model TS01.  I rarely power on my secondary Dell 24" IPS screen now, I just don't see the need since the Samsung looks so nice.

Reviews.Title: Muchas Gracias
Reviews.Author: Luis Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: Muchas GraciasMaravilloso lleno mis espectativas. Estoy muy agradecido y contento. es un extraordinario televisor.Gracias... Sera recomendado a todos mis conocidos

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS!
Reviews.Author: Christine
Reviews.Content: Another amazing Samsung Product!  Setting tweaking needed for best picture / color (just like everyone says) but once you get it, this is an awesome TV!

Reviews.Title: Great choice for great price!
Reviews.Author: cajunmommieto2
Reviews.Content: Bought two of these for children's rooms. They are a hit. Great picture, easy to use and shipping was fast and accurate. Would make the same choice again!

Reviews.Title: Great quality for the price
Reviews.Author: Old Georgia Geek
Reviews.Content: I looked at many Amazon and other retailer reviews and Consumer Reports etc. My visitors complement the picture whenever they see it. I have watched football and ice skating and no issue with the refresh rate for me. My only wish is that there were three HD ports but I already had an HD splitter for my dead Vizio tha this replaced so not really an issue for me either. And, I saved $102.00 by buying it through Amazon rather than the local big box store. That is significant!!!!

Reviews.Title: Samsung 40 inch 1080p TV
Reviews.Author: Peter N. Rogers
Reviews.Content: Light, slim functional, great picture but, like many TVs these days, slow boot-up.This model lakes the bells & whistles, Netflix etc, and is great value at around $400 for a 40 inch screen, and it is used in the bedroom, so do not need too many bells and whistles.Used to be a Sony fan, but my last four TVs have been samsung, and I have no complaints, only compliments.

Reviews.Title: The picture is terrific!
Reviews.Author: Chuck Adams
Reviews.Content: The TV shipped on time and was as described.  The set up was easy and the picture quality is stunning.  I would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product.
Reviews.Author: Ron Owczarzak
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent product for the price. Simple to operate and trouble free with a clear picture. I would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Picture
Reviews.Author: dm
Reviews.Content: Outstanding picture quality/clarity even in brightly lit room.  Easy to set up, Light and simple to position on enclosed stand.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Bailey
Reviews.Content: Beautiful picture, good sound, easy set up, what more could you want?I am so glad I got this TV, it truly enhances the experience

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Rajendar
Reviews.Content: Nice TV. i got this for $400 on black Friday.clarity ,sound system everything is good.  ...... ......... .... ... ..

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32 inch LED TV
Reviews.Author: Dennis L. Fleming
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this TV.  I have not had a LED or HD TV in the past and this more than exceeded my expectations.

Reviews.Title: TERRIFIC TV
Reviews.Author: JCLOCK
Reviews.Content: TERRIFIC TV SET, DELIVERY ON TIME, EASY TO SETUP, GREAT PICTURE WITH AND WITHOUTR HD.  WE HAVE FOUR SAMSUNG TVS AND ARE HAPPY WITH EACH.

Reviews.Title: better BB pictures
Reviews.Author: Nanalou W. Sauder
Reviews.Content: I love the clarity of the picture, particularly for Basketball Games.  It will be even better when  the maintenance department at my retirement community gets the appropriate interior wire/cable installed so that I can get the HD service that I have ordered.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LED TV
Reviews.Author: Starr
Reviews.Content: I have given this 5 stars because, although I have not hooked mine up yet, my daughter & husband have an exact one.  I was so imspressed with theirs that I purchased one as well.  The colors are vibrant and the many features make it an excellent choice for anyone.  I would highly recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UNEH5000
Reviews.Author: ajb3
Reviews.Content: Totally met me expectations. Great screen, good sound, competitive pricing. Am using as TV in bedroom so no need foe internet connectivity. In short, this TV is a good value and meets my needs well.

Reviews.Title: Mom really loves the new tv
Reviews.Author: MEB
Reviews.Content: Thanks Amazon.It got here at 9:10pm.It was easy to put it together.It does look great.The regular channels come in great with the ole Flat RCA antenna.It picked 65 channels  quickly.Samsung got here in 3 days!MEBAdded a Channel Master 4228 HD 8 Bay antenna on 7-19-2013.This HDTV isgetting 10 Bars on 6 channels.My ole Insignia is getting 97% on 5 channels as well.The PQ is still outstanding on the SAMSUNG!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV! Sharp picture. Works Great
Reviews.Author: preppyesque "Patrick"
Reviews.Content: Great tv! Sharp picture. Works great! Great extras. Nice size. Great rating on Consumer Reports Magazine as the best tv for it's size. BUY THIS TV!

Reviews.Title: The TV looks great and works great.
Reviews.Author: Nicholas A. Cooper
Reviews.Content: I don't have many complaints about the TV because it's the first nice HDTV I've owned, but so far I'm loving it. The picture is clear, even on standard channels. There's lots of user support too in the Samsung forums, and the Amazon reviews that help with settings for various types of inputs. I could use an articulating stand, but I knew what I was buying.Would definitely recommend it to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH5000 32-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV (Black) great TV at great price
Reviews.Author: Vicky "the great"
Reviews.Content: I got this LED TV full HD 1080p on cyber monday sale on a good price of 327. It has very good picture quality and excellent sound. I returned the previous one (UN32EH4000) bought from Walmart on Black Friday for 265 as it had pathetic sound and no sound out option.***---***After 14 months of purchase it has developed a black spot on top right corner. Can't do anything now as it is out of warranty. It is not much noticeable and everything else functions great.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Nathan Peter
Reviews.Content: Love the item. Did a lil research before purchasing this tv. Should have come with smart hub but good item. would recommend anyone to buy this. Item came very quickly

Reviews.Title: A Great Product for the Price
Reviews.Author: Annie J
Reviews.Content: I got this a couple of weeks before Thanksgiving for $477 and within two weeks I got $50 back because of the "TV Low Price Guarantee" (I love you Amazon!). For $427, it is really a great deal. I like Sumsang better as they have very thin edge. Picture quality is also good.

Reviews.Title: Sleek and crisp
Reviews.Author: Bennett's mom
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with the TV.  Great picture, easy set up.  I hooked it up to my cable, a blue ray smart dvd player, and a surround sound system.  I heard people complain about only 2 HDMI cables, but it works just fine

Reviews.Title: This TV is greast
Reviews.Author: London Mace
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 for my kids and they love it. The picture is clean and the TV it self is very light weight and thin. It's a great product.

Reviews.Title: Great looking tv!!
Reviews.Author: J-man
Reviews.Content: Great looking, had to do some adjusting on the picture but now it looks great. The only thing I don't like is that it only has 2 HDMI ports. That is really frustrating when you have more than two things to plug in.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Great price
Reviews.Author: Anonymous
Reviews.Content: Had been shopping for a TV at a reasonable price. This is a basic TV with a great picture. Easy to set up and configure. Would recommend. Plus got to use the Amazon TV price guarantee, so saved even more.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: Great TV and it works perfect for my bedroom. I am using my PS3 on it as well and it is a great television (just make sure you wait to get a good price on it as it tends to vary drastically.

Reviews.Title: Great TV...Great price!
Reviews.Author: Keith G.
Reviews.Content: Not a lot of bells and whistles but the price was great! Also it arrived in 3 days, totally blew me away. I bought this for my bedroom. Alls I had to do was plug it in and go. I bought this a week before Black Friday for $475. I went online a week later and saw it for $425...I sent amazon an email and they credited my account .

Reviews.Title: Great deal but a bit dark
Reviews.Author: Lee
Reviews.Content: I never expected to get an LED TV for this price.  Out of the box the image quality is a bit terrible.  Mostly, images were dark and slightly discolored.  After some adjustment, following reviews given previously, i was able to greatly improve the image.  Further increasing the brightness made the image much much better.  All in all I am very happy with the TV.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 50-inch TV
Reviews.Author: Barb
Reviews.Content: I previously had a smaller- screen Samsung. that I liked, but since it was getting hard for me to see, I decided to get a larger screen.  Oh, how I ejoy being able to see it again.  Samsung makes a good product and the price was right.

Reviews.Title: Great value TV
Reviews.Author: Lenox
Reviews.Content: Overall, great quality, so far. Sharp picture, no glare screen, easy menu and sound is better than most this size.

Reviews.Title: HDTV AWESOME
Reviews.Author: DailyDriven
Reviews.Content: This tv is sitting in my room and I use it for my Laptop and PS3,  I couldn't be any happier, takes a bit of tweeking with the setttings that you can find online

Reviews.Title: Awesome tv
Reviews.Author: Shorty
Reviews.Content: Great sound, picture, color, display, awesome for gaming as well. Recommend for anyone who loves their tv turned up loudly!!

Reviews.Title: Samsung is value for the money!!
Reviews.Author: Jeff D
Reviews.Content: We're really pleased with the several Samsung TV's we recently bought.  All offer quality, value for the money, and plenty of the technology we were looking for when we upgraded our AV equipment.

Reviews.Title: My 3rd Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Frank Loving
Reviews.Content: I have found Samsung TVs to.  They are4 a great value34.be very reliable,  I have three now in my house

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH5000 32-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: R J Phifer
Reviews.Content: Bought this for myself. Great picture and sound quality. I recommend this TV for anyone looking for a 32 inch HDTV.

Reviews.Title: Best for the Price !
Reviews.Author: CalFord
Reviews.Content: Best LED 32" TV for the price hands down.  Plugged the TV, turned it on, and was very happy with the picture and ease of use of the controls.  No complaints anywhere, especially for the price.

Reviews.Title: Very nice tv
Reviews.Author: EAG
Reviews.Content: Would recommend this tv to a friend.  Was easy to set up and it looks great.Got a good price on it to.

Reviews.Title: Reasonable secondary TV for the money
Reviews.Author: TC from DC "houn"
Reviews.Content: I've had good experience with Samsung sets; the 50+ SmartTV is killer, so when I was looking for a replacement bedroom set, I started here. For the money, the picture is quite good. Easy set-up, good size, and perfect for the price. No complaints.

Reviews.Title: Amazing quality TV
Reviews.Author: Richard Loft
Reviews.Content: This TV was everything I hoped for.  The sharpness and clarity of the LED screen is great, I am currently using it as a 40" monitor for my desktop PC that I control with wireless mouse & keyboard.  Samsung makes great screens and this is no exception.  Very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great 32" TV
Reviews.Author: Jay Schmeckpeper "schmeckp28"
Reviews.Content: I've purchased a couple Samsung plasma TV's and a competitor LCD TV. The plasmas are great, but it's time to buy another LCD. There was viewing angle limitations on the standard LCD. This back lit "LED" LCD is just great. Set up was easy and all features work fine.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat it for the money
Reviews.Author: WCR
Reviews.Content: We purchase this TV for our lower family room. It is avery bit as good as our other Samsung TVs. We wantes to replace the TV in this room with a newer TV and cable readt HD unit. This Samsung was a perfect fit,  Inexpensive, clean looking, easy for grandchildren to use and perfect fit for our needs.

Reviews.Title: Now I know why HDTV is so great.
Reviews.Author: David N. Ravin
Reviews.Content: My son- in- law hooked up the 40" Samsung in about 5 minutes and I was watching Keeping Up Appearances while I hooked up the Samsung Blue Ray DVD player so my grandson could watch a Superman DVD. I couldn't believe the sharpness of the picture and the absolutely vibrant colors. Now I know what all the excitement about Samsung Products is about. The 24 hour pick up of the defective set and exchange for the replacement  worked perfectly and I am a hero to my grandson. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Perfect TV for a bedroom
Reviews.Author: SDI
Reviews.Content: Purchase was made via Amazon Prime so arrived in 2 days. Set up was very easy even for an electronically challenged individual. Used the settings recommended by another reviewer which made the set up even easier. Took me a bit of time to figure out how to transfer control of the set to my Time Warner remote. TW was no help at all by the way...just wasted my time on hold. Picture quality and sound are excellent. Really a good value for the price.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32 in LED
Reviews.Author: high flyer
Reviews.Content: The Samsung 32 in LED TV is a great product. The picture is crisp and the colors are great. No problems with the controls. We have an LCD TV and this one seems to have a sharper picture.

Reviews.Title: Great Kitchen TV
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: Bought to replace 18" CRT TV in kitchen area.  I fired the cable TV service and switched to Internet sources using the Roku IP to TV box.  This TV is bright, has great 1080P detail and the right size for the intended purpose.  Better, the two HDMI ports allow me to connect (with a long cable) to a laptop.  Roku does not support YouTube or browser based video feeds.  Recipes from web pages are viewable across the room.  Remote allows easy switching between movie (using Roku) and recipe (using laptop).  Nice built in speakers are loud enough to be heard over vent fan.  Works great, very good price and fast shipping.

Reviews.Title: 32" Samsung led
Reviews.Author: Shannon 14068
Reviews.Content: I always love Samsung as my older tv after 10 years is still up to par.  I returned this 32" because it is just too small to view from 14", approx distance.  However I do have a complaint about the viewing angle as it gets fogging viewing from the side.I have to return and not happy with the retun pricing.

Reviews.Title: Basically good.
Reviews.Author: SHL
Reviews.Content: I definitely enjoy this tv now. The picture and color are good ... and, the sound is very good. My "complaints" are that there was considerable testing and tinkering to do to get the color and picture just right. Also, I'm not quite as happy with the somewhat more oblong ratio as compared with my Sony of similar size or with the relative inconvenience (also compared to my Sony) of having to go through the setup catagories everytime I want to change the picture ratio.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Adamadjs
Reviews.Content: Great TV!  it came in a timely manner and was just as advertised.  It was easy to put together and set up.We are very happy with the purchase!

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV for my game systems
Reviews.Author: David O.
Reviews.Content: I'll keep this review short and sweet. This is an excellent TV for people like me who want a nice HD system to play their Blu-Ray movies and video game systems (PS3 for me!). I have barely dabbled with the actual TV aspect of it, in regards to cable/satellite/what have you. I did notice that the picture quality was never quite what I wanted it to be for the TV, which is why I ended up just turning to Netflix, which always looks excellent. I admit it is very possible to be a user error in not understanding how to adjust the TV settings appropriately, but that's not why I buy a TV. I want a TV I can plug in and play that looks good without me spending hours trying to adjust it for that sweet spot. So for gamers or movie aficionados, this TV is wonderful. I'm sure it looks great with regular TV if you know how to adjust the settings, but thankfully you don't have to if you have other sources of input.If you are looking for a great TV to play games or watch movies, I couldn't recommend this TV more. If you want it for simple television watching, I'd suggest getting something a little less nice. This TV is really meant for high definition entertainment.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Eric Tallman
Reviews.Content: After some minor picture tweaking, this TV is outperforming what I had hoped for. The only major draw back is the lack of HDMI ports (only two). If this TV is not your primary or you don't have a lot of "toys" to connect, then you will love it.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: repeat customer
Reviews.Content: Delivery was prompt.  We selected this item for the picture quality and special features to play videos directly from a flash drive. The picture quality is great. One call to support for help in making the video repeat automaticaly was courtious prompt and accurate.  We high recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: GREAT FOR XBOX 360!!
Reviews.Author: 1st_avenger
Reviews.Content: Oh my goodness, I couldn't be happier with this tv. I had a 37inch LCD Vizio that kept having random minor problems over the years. I just bought this one a couple weeks ago and am MORE than satisfied. Using an HDMI cable from your xbox to this TV gives you crystal clear videos and gaming. Go with your gut and get what you really want. I thought the 40 inch would be too big but I'm glad I didn't settle for a 32inch.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Television
Reviews.Author: Daniel Frisch
Reviews.Content: I can honestly that this LED-LCD television is worth its weight in gold.  The picture depth, contrast, and quality are simply put, OUTSTANDING!  Definitely worth every penny.  Samsung has done it again.

Reviews.Title: Good quality picture
Reviews.Author: Jeff Elmore
Reviews.Content: Good product for the money, I would recommend it to anyone who is looking for a good tv for the office or bedroom

Reviews.Title: Great picture, easy setup, sound output is fantastic.
Reviews.Author: okiedan "Pro Bono Publico"
Reviews.Content: Using this wall mounted in my man cave.  Using this with an apple tv, and a dvd player.  The picture quality is very nice.  It is light weight and easy to mount too my wall mount.  Setup was easy and intuitive.  Matching the setup protocol on my other Samsung tvs.The sound quality on this tv is outstanding.  It is one of the first I have every bought where I have no desire to add a sound bar or external speakers.  The sound is very crisp and quite loud.I wish tv manufactures placed all of the inputs on the back.  When the hdmi and usb plugs are on the side it creates cord clutter.I have had good luck with samsung tv sets.  I also own a 52 inch plasma and a 42 inch lcd.  The first is now two years old and the second is three years old.  Both have worked just fine without any issues.  It is because of my two prior tv sets that I chose this one.

Reviews.Title: Great (not amazing) but solid and sharp.
Reviews.Author: Josh  Wallingford
Reviews.Content: Bought three. I needed screens that looked sharp for some biz functions. These look great!The inputs are a little limited (mostly digital), but I'm playing through mpeg4 files or hdmi. So I'm set.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: DPN
Reviews.Content: This is my second Samsung TV and I like it as well as I liked the first.  It was easy to setup and it is light.  I'm always surprised at how much lighter TV's have gotten over the years. The picture and sound are great.  The price was right and Consumer Reports gave the Samsung a good ratting.

Reviews.Title: mom loves it
Reviews.Author: Carolan J. Helzer "Carolan H."
Reviews.Content: bought this for my mother and she loves it.  Great, clear picture, perfect size for her new apt. Wish I had gotten this for myself

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: R. J. Mills
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV based on positive reviews we saw.  Easy to set up (for just basic TV watching - we're not gamers), great picture, easy to follow menu.  If had it to do over, would purchase next size up, though.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Tim Smith
Reviews.Content: I love this TV. I was told to buy a Samsung and I don't regret it at all. The quality of the picture is great and the size is perfect for me.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: jpcoymat
Reviews.Content: After looking at most of the HD TVs out there between 40 - 46 inches, this one seemed to offer the best bang for your buck.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: thiemakr
Reviews.Content: The TV is exactly what you would expect from Samsung.  Great picture quality, very user friendly. I definitely recommend this TV to anyone looking for an affordable and reliable TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Santiago Peredo Mendia
Reviews.Content: the TV is great, yeah it lacks some of the last features to connect wireless and so on, but with the PS you don't need them, instead you can get great image quality at a lower cost.  Totally happy with the product.

Reviews.Title: samsungtvwilliam
Reviews.Author: williamreview
Reviews.Content: This is my first HD TV.  I can not imagine much better, though I am not a gamer.  I was expecting audio volume reduction during commercials but am not realizing it.  I have seen many other TV's in stores and don't know that I would choose any differently.  Larger would be better but this fits the space in my office, so is just fine.

Reviews.Title: I'm happy with my purchase
Reviews.Author: Preston
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my bedroom and have been happy with it. It has a good picture for sports. It does get a little dark on some movies but I have the color set at factory settings & have read reviews on how to adjust the color for the best results. For the money this is a good TV.

Reviews.Title: only audio no picture.
Reviews.Author: carla
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv and it never worked. As a matter of fact the product was dated nov 13 and I purchased on dec 4th. After connecting all I got was audio. No picture. The Amazon / Samsung Technician confirmed that the tv is defective.  Since I live outside ofthe usa I am unable to send back because of the cost to me. So I either pay to repair or enjoy a 40' audio player. So I really rate this No Star.........

Reviews.Title: Maybe a decent TV.  Not a decent monitor/TV.
Reviews.Author: Ted Lemon
Reviews.Content: I ordered this TV based on a number of reviews that raved about the video quality when connected to a computer.  When it arrived, I was extremely disappointed--it was set up to overscan, and there seemed to be no way to fix that.  Fortunately, one of the reviews here explained how to do that, and I was able to adjust the image quality to what I'm pretty sure is as good as it's going to get.  I suspect this really is a good TV for the price, but if you want to plug your computer into it for any reason other than gaming, it's not the monitor for you--text is fuzzy, not crisp, and no amount of fiddling helps with that.  Also, the TV does not support HDMI+analog audio (I knew this before I ordered it, and it wasn't a deal breaker, but I mention it here because it took some serious spelunking to figure this out).So if you are looking at this because you want to buy a 32" TV, you can probably ignore my whining, but if you want it as a computer monitor with speakers that's also a TV, I'm afraid you are barking up the wrong tree.

Reviews.Title: Don't get a smart TV
Reviews.Author: ananyone
Reviews.Content: Non-smart TVs are the way to go. Software and technology move extremely fast. "Smart" TVs will be outdated and slow before you know it. A nice big display with lots of inputs, like this one, is all you need. Buy a Chromecast for $35 and you can hook it up to your computer for instant update-ability. Don't waste money on a "Smart" TV.

Reviews.Title: SAMAUNG LED panels breaking
Reviews.Author: augieb
Reviews.Content: The internet is full of SAMSUNG 40" to 50 " screen panels failing after one to two years of use. My 50" was not used very much.  It began to fail after a year of use.  SAMSUNG service  provided no assistance.  Don't buy SAMSUNG.  Lower price but not worth the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Dead Pixels
Reviews.Author: Trey Ahrens
Reviews.Content: Bought this item because a friend recommended it. Received it by FedEx within the weak. There was a line of very noticeable dead pixels in the upper right of the screen. There were also multiple stuck pixels throughout the center. Amazon replaced it free of charge. 2nd one came in with two slices across the front of the box, obviously from warehouse shuffling. Opened the box to find a large gouge in the center of the screen.This might possibly be the best picture a TV can give, but I wouldn't know. Thx Amazon.com

Reviews.Title: Slightly disappointed
Reviews.Author: mitty
Reviews.Content: I have the UN40EH5000 with the Samsung TS02 panel.I was amazed at how bad this HDTV looked with the stock settings. Ghosting and halo artifacts were clearly noticeable, along with a fairly severe motion blur. The construction quality also left a lot to be desired as there was a big gap between each HDMI jack and the back if the cabinet. Thankfully, the HDMI inputs work alright. My unit also leans slightly to the left side and doesn't seem particularly level.Turning the sharpness level from 50 down to 15 worked wonders as most of the ghosting and halo artifacts disappeared. But motion blur was still a huge problem for me. Searching online, I found several people having that exact same issue with the TS02 panel - so it's not just my unit. I've seen older 60hz refresh rate HDTVs that have a similar problem, but this Samsung seems particularly bad for a newer TV.And so I looked online for some calibration settings. I found one from someone on a videophile message board using some sort of a software program. This calibration (described below) worked for me. Fine details now come through, while the brightness and color performance seems much improved. Still, the motion blur is barely acceptable. If you're thinking of buying this HDTV for sports or action movies I'd definitely look elsewhere.Pros:Bright, sharp pictureExcellent contrast (blacks are very black)Great color performanceGood sound for a flat panelAnalog audio outCute remoteDecent DTV OTA tunerVery energy efficientCons:Fairly bad motion blur (don't buy if you plan on watching lots of sports)Whites are have a slightly blue tintNeeds calibrationConstruction quality not the bestMy slightly modified calibration settings (with TS02 panel):Picture settings:Mode = Movie (bypasses 'dynamic backlight'). Backlight = 16. Contrast = 92. Brightness = 45. Sharpness = 15. Color = 55. Tint = 50/50.Advanced settings:Color Space = Auto. White Balance = R-Gain: 19, G-Gain: 39, B-Gain: 14. Gamma = -1. Dynamic Contrast = Off. Black Tone = Off. Flesh Tone = 0. Motion Lighting = Off.Picture options:Color Tone = Warm 1. Size = 16:9. Digital Noise Filter= Off. LED Motion Plus = Off.

Reviews.Title: Good Watchin Television
Reviews.Author: opin
Reviews.Content: My old 27" tv finally stopped working. I wanted to replace it with a good hd tv, but after researching and researching some more, i found that a led tv seem to be the best way to go. The space i wanted to place it in was 32"x25". So a 32" led tv would fit just fine in that space. The only problem i had was that the led tv wastoo expensive. You knnow times a little tight. Well, i started researching the new 2012 led/lcd models. The panasonic tlc32e5 and samsung un32eh5000 2012 led/lcd models both caught my attention. The price was in the same ball park. The only difference was that the panasonic is a smart tv. While thinking about the difference, i decided that i only wanted to watch tv.  So i went with the samsung un32eh 5000 model. I just want to say i enjoy watching it. But, if you want to do more than watch tv the panasonic tlc32e5 might be the way to go. Hope this help you a little in your decision making.

Reviews.Title: This TV will not work for a computer monitor!
Reviews.Author: gr155000
Reviews.Content: I wanted a large computer monitor and chose this one first. It will not reach 1080...only 1600x900....not good.I took it back and bought a Toshiba 32L2400U 32-Inch 1080p for the same price and it works perfectly as a large computer monitor with good picture quality for espn online and MLB online.

Reviews.Title: Well-made product
Reviews.Author: Chitwah "Stanjbass"
Reviews.Content: This, I understand, is a "starter" TV. I guess I'm too old to care about my Facebook Rating, or whatever perpetual children may call it, because to my wife and I, this TV is simply the greatest! Setup was a sinch-- plug her in and turn her on. We have Time-Warrner cable, and all I had to do was just plug in. VOILA!! Simply the best!Then, I attached Amazon Fire TV: BAM!I just think the world of Samsung. Of course, I also think the world of Amazon. Both work easily and smoothly, as does Time Warner with this TV.

Reviews.Title: amazing!
Reviews.Author: Noelle Dissler
Reviews.Content: Best TV I have ever owned! I love Samsung products. The picture is clear the audio is unbeatable. Good buy

Reviews.Title: Some set-up guidance would've been MOST helpful
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Foote
Reviews.Content: The picture is great so far and hanging it on the wall stand.  However, the  instructions for the actual set up of picture, options, etc. was less than helpful.  We did it twice & I' m STILL not sure it's correct.  Maybe some more explicit details in ENGLISH & fewer instructions in what seemed like 100 other languages would be warranted.  Put the other languages in a SEPARATE BOOKLET!!!

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV, COLOR IS GREAT
Reviews.Author: karen lyons
Reviews.Content: THIS IS MY 3RD SAMSUNG TV ONE IS A 40 IN SMART TV WHICH IS WONDERFUL , BUT THIS ONE IS A 32 IN FOR THE MASTER BEDROOM BOTH COLOR AND SOUND ARE GREAT .WULD TELL OTHERS TO BUT THESE PRODUCTS

Reviews.Title: tv
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: We bought this for our bedroom. The tv was good size and worked great! However, the only big down side was that you have to use a remote. There are no BUTTONS on this thing. If batteries die, you are waiting to watch tv until you replace them. If remote breaks, not tv, you have to wait to get a universal one. etc etc etc. We returned it because we did not like the fact that it had no buttons. Aside from that, it was nice

Reviews.Title: Won't work for me as an alarm clock
Reviews.Author: zoot381
Reviews.Content: If you don't care about using the TV On/Off timer,  this TV is just fine.  But, this is for my bedroom, and my bedroom TV is also my alarm clock.  For some reason,  the timer function only allows you to choose the coax input or USB input sources.  I don't use either.  I use only the HDMI and RCA inputs, but those aren't TV timer source options. Even the tube TV I'm replacing let me choose from all 4 inputs for the timer.  The black and white raster with no audio doesn't wake me up, so back it goes.  Yay - just over $20 shipping to return it.  : (

Reviews.Title: My 32 inch Samsung
Reviews.Author: Diane Scerba
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this product!  Since I have an older style entertainment center, one that I bought 12 years ago, I was restricted to what size tv I could buy.  This tv fits perfectly in the space, the sound and picture quality is fantastic, and it works well with my cable company.  Samsung is a name I have always trusted, and I would highly recommend this tv to everyone!

Reviews.Title: Great basic set
Reviews.Author: Dew "dc2133"
Reviews.Content: Bought this to replace an old CRT set. Colors are much better, text much sharper. Already have streaming devices, so I didn't need smart tv apps some of the fancier sets have. Works well. Actually fairly loud, which is something the folks who'll be using this set for needs.

Reviews.Title: Great For The Price
Reviews.Author: Terry Champion "Mountain Biker"
Reviews.Content: Very good picture, decent sound. Works great with a Google Chromecast. Just the right size for our bedroom. I would recommend this for the budget minded person needing a good tv for a good price.

Reviews.Title: Extrordinary Picture!
Reviews.Author: Carolann
Reviews.Content: Watching my new beautiful television as I write this and I am thrilled to watch the Olympics in high quality HD. This Samsung is thin, light and the design is exactly what I was looking for. Love everything about it!  Fabulous price!  Thank you!

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG46EH5000
Reviews.Author: edward r. kelly
Reviews.Content: SHIPPING PACKAGE EXCELLENT, WELL PROTECTED EVEN THOUGH TRAVELING COAST TO COAST.  UNIT IS LIGHTER THAN EXPECTED THUS EASY TO HANDLE.  PICTURE QUALITY GOOD, BUT NOT AS SHARP AS MY PREVIOUSLY OWNED SONY.  QUALITY OF SOUND IS GOOD, NOT NECESSRY TO HOOK UP EXTERNAL SPEAKER AS PER MY VIZIO.  OVERALL HAPPY WITH THE UNIT AND THE PRICE WAS REASONABLE.

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: Bob and Jean
Reviews.Content: We're elderly and finally decided to replace our old TV.  This one is so sharp, even we old folk can enjoy HD TV.  It was a snap to set up, and for the technologically impaired such as we, that's a real plus.  It programs itself.

Reviews.Title: Great bedroom TV for gaming, movies, etc.
Reviews.Author: John J. Steck Jr. "shaboodles"
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for a little over a month now and I've been nothing by happy with it! It took me a bit to get use to the picture after staring at a plasma for over 4 years. After some tweaking though, I got the picture looking nearly identical to what the plasma put out as far color tone, black level, and brightness. The sound isn't bad either but I only use the TV speakers when watching sports or shows. It has a fairly good viewing angle from all sides and doesn't run too warm either. My plasma would literally heat the room which is a pretty small to begin with.These are the settings that I found best all around for gaming, movies, sports, and shows. That's only if you're like me and don't like to have to keep switching between picture modes.Picture Mode: StandardBacklight: 20Contrast: 90Brightness: 40Sharpness: 35Color: 70Tint: 50/50In Advanced Settings I set Color Space to "Auto" with everything else set OFF or at 0. I left the White Balance settings alone.In Picture Options I set Color Tone to "Standard", Digital Noise Filter to "High" with Film Mode and Motion Plus turned OFF(These two don't seem to do much anyway).Again, this is what I found best all around if you'd rather not switch between picture modes for different types of entertainment. It really comes down to what your preferences are but I hope these settings at least help get the picture to what you like.So if you're looking for a good budget TV to go in the bedroom or gaming room, I would definitely recommend this.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Deborah Tipton
Reviews.Content: I love this tv. Much cheaper on here than every other website, even samsung! Only thing is I wished it had maybe one more HDMI input and that one or both of the existing ones were on the back panel not the side. Other than that this tv is perfect. Buying another soon for my mom.

Reviews.Title: Love This TV
Reviews.Author: BearPup
Reviews.Content: This is the second Samsung I've owned and I'm quite satisfied with this purchase. Out of the box, you hardly need the instructions to set it up. Having said that, read the directions on the sets numerous adjustments, especially the Advanced Picture Options, where you find adjustments for flesh tones, picture sharpness, and white balance. These are well worth the time for the incredible increase in picture quality and viewability.The set doesn't have as many input/output plugs as many sets do, but with a little creative wiring, you can get just about any configuration desired. For example, I use an input selector box coupled to a signal amplifier to replace 1 pair of component jacks with 4 input and 4 output connections; all without losing signal strength or clarity.And given the discounted price that Amazon is charging for this TV (by far the lowest price I saw online), my best piece of advice? Buy it!

Reviews.Title: What a Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Shaw Lynn Preeste
Reviews.Content: This is a great LED HDTV.  I did some research and found that Samsung is the leading 32-inch set, and Amazon had it at a terrific price.  I got it for my granddaughter for Christmas, and she loves it.  I love it because it has the best TV picture I've ever seen, and as old as I am, that's a lot of TVs.  So, not knowing a thing about televisions except what I see when I watch it, that's about the best review I can give.  Refer to those tech experts for the bells and whistles reviews, but for a layman, this is a great buy with just enough ports to plug things into.

Reviews.Title: great TV!!!
Reviews.Author: Rachael J Howen
Reviews.Content: We love this TV! excellent sound and display. Works great! Super fast shipping, too! The screen is just the right size for our living room.

Reviews.Title: very pleased with Samsung 32 inch HDTV
Reviews.Author: Cory S. Krueger
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with the purchase easy to set up.  Great picture quality.  Do not have home theater but sound from this TV seems more than acceptable.  Good value for the price paid.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Panel Lottery????
Reviews.Author: dennis "D. Jock Nomore"
Reviews.Content: First of all the factory settings are terrible out of the box. There have been several comments about other manufacturers building Samsung panels. The version code on mine is not on any code list and by the price I suspected this to be a special version for the holidays, especially since it was built 12/13. I was skeptical because of the video quality. After getting several video setting calibrations from users on the web, they are a great place to start but everyone is extremely different. Again suspecting different makers/different settings, I used the one that looked best to me. After several hours of additional tweaking I have a fantastic looking tv with no pixel problems or lag. I also found that the best results came from turning off most of the special features, this was suggested by several users and many said why. There have also been several comments about the audio, which is a problem with most flat screens. I love the movie audio mode on this tv,there is more than enough volume and separation. Some have complained about the bass in movie mode but I think it makes a richer sound. I might add I am a video editor and am extremely critical of video and audio quality. I would give both a 5 star after the extensive setting tweaks,at least on my TV. I suspect it may be different for each user and that is probably not a good thing. The other things that make it a 4 rating is it needs at least one more hdmi input,&the; hdmis are on the side, which would be fine if the power cord was longer. As it is now there is no room on the hdmi side to put a blu ray, apple tv, or direct TV box and still keep the TV plugged in.

Reviews.Title: Awesome little HDTV
Reviews.Author: C. Courtney "TAZ"
Reviews.Content: Great little HDTV for the money.  32" with slim bezel, very nice mounted in areas where a small TV is wanted.  The Smart features are nice features but I bought it for the picture quality which is about as good as it gets for an LED TV.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Faria
Reviews.Content: I have it for a year now and is a great tv. First It was strange looking, but once I learn how to put the image at my taste, everything was just perfect.It can reproduce videos (mp4, avi..) and music (mp3). It have the option to enable o disable the subtitles and sinc them. It have the Sap option that is useful for me. I haven't had any problems with it.It arrive complete, in one piece xD, and with batteries for the remote.

Reviews.Title: No problems, GG
Reviews.Author: Diego Lopez
Reviews.Content: Very nice TV, excellent relation Quality/price, I recommend it.The only thing that I cannot found is how to operate the tv without remote control, maybe it's not possible.

Reviews.Title: Great job!
Reviews.Author: E. A. Larson
Reviews.Content: Finally got it set up.  Product arrived safely at our front door right on time.  Best price I had seen anywhere without standing in a line.  Works wonderfully.  Good clear sound and picture.  Glad we got the 1080p!  It was worth the extra.

Reviews.Title: Great value for great TV
Reviews.Author: Indy purchaser
Reviews.Content: Great value. Easy Setup. Great picture. This is my third Samsung 46"purchase. One 4 years ago for me, one 3 years ago for my mother, and one this year for mother-in-law. All great if all you need is a basic HDTV.

Reviews.Title: slim, light, great picture
Reviews.Author: addicted2prime
Reviews.Content: This was the right price for the best TV on the market. Love the picture quality, and it sync's well with my other media.

Reviews.Title: Great no frills TV.
Reviews.Author: david
Reviews.Content: Has a slightly insufficient number of HDMI inputs (2) but the picture is great and it's slim and stylish so I'm happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: P. R. Madden "home renovator"
Reviews.Content: Great TV except for the fact the picture is not quite what I expected. I have another Samsung that is great. No matter how I adjust the picture, it is nowhere as good as my other set.

Reviews.Title: Sometimes screen dims, can't seem to turn this feature off
Reviews.Author: Roxy
Reviews.Content: I'm not totally satisfied with this TV because I can't seem to get it to be consistently as bright as I want without jacking up the contrast/brightness and losing picture quality. On standard mode, sometimes the backlight dims, and I haven't been able to figure out how to turn this function off. I have the backlight turned up all the way, and all of the power saving options turned off, but occasionally the screen will still dim somewhat. When you bring up the menu or change the volume so the interface comes up, the whole screen comes back to full brightness, and dims again as soon as the menu disappears. I read that this doesn't happen in movie mode, but I can't get the picture the way I want it in that mode.

Reviews.Title: The TV was okay, but nothing to rave about
Reviews.Author: Rodney Schmidt
Reviews.Content: Good TV, not enough HDMI ports. All and good, it's good for the bedroom! The color is pretty good too!

Reviews.Title: Love, Love, Love this TV
